2017.tpci.product.easter.treasure-tin.de:
A Pokémon Treasure Chest!

A trove of Pokémon treasures! This sturdy metal case contains more than a dozen special Pokémon goodies, including many not found anywhere else.

The Pokémon Trading Card Game: Collector Chest includes:

5 Pokémon TCG booster packs
3 foil promo cards featuring Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio!
A cool Pokémon coin
2 colorful sticker sheets
A mini album to store your favorite cards
A Pokémon notepad and 4 pencils

2017.tpci.product.fall-tin.sell-text: Power walks down many roads, and none is more mysterious than the power of Pokémon-GX! Choose Ho-Oh-GX, Necrozma-GX, or Marshadow-GX in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Mysterious Powers Tin. Each of these beautiful tins contains all the astonishing power of a Legendary or Mythical Pokémon-GX, ready to change everything with the turn of a card! In this tin, you’ll find: • 1 of 3 foil Pokémon-GX cards: Ho-Oh-GX, Necrozma-GX, or Marshadow-GX! • 4 Pokémon TCG booster packs! • A code card to unlock a playable deck in the Pokémon Trading Card Game Online!

2017.tpci.product.sm5.booster.sell-text: Pass through the Ultra Wormhole into a bizarre new Pokémon world, where familiar sights become strange and new powers are unlocked! Watch Necrozma’s power grow, and marvel as brand-new {*} cards reveal their astounding effects on play. Meet Dialga-GX and Palkia-GX, and encounter bizarre Ultra Beasts and wild new forms of Alola’s Legendary Pokémon. Explore a new dimension in the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Ultra Prism expansion!
2017.tpci.product.sm5.booster.wrap.name: Sun & Moon—Ultra Prism
2017.tpci.product.sm5.etb.dawnwingsnecro: Elite Trainer Dawn Wings Necrozma Deck Box
Sun & Moon—Ultra Prism Elite Trainer Box: Dawn Wings Necrozma
Elite Trainer Dawn Wings Necrozma Card Sleeves
2017.tpci.product.sm5.etb.duskmanenecroz: Elite Trainer Dusk Mane Necrozma Deck Box
Sun & Moon—Ultra Prism Elite Trainer Box: Dusk Mane Necrozma
Elite Trainer Dusk Mane Necrozma Card Sleeves
2017.tpci.product.sm5.pcd.imperialcomman: The royal Empoleon is ready to lead Abomasnow and a team of Water types into battle! Together, they can overwhelm and freeze out foes with perfect timing. Unlock the power of ice, wind, and wave with the Imperial Command theme deck!
Ice and Snow at Your Imperial Command!
2017.tpci.product.sm5.pcd.machstrike.sel: A Dragon-type Pokémon knows that how you begin a battle determines how you end it—so call on Garchomp and Lucario, and go for the big attack with powerful hits at top speed! The Mach Strike theme deck pulls no punches!
2017.tpci.product.sm5.prereleasepack.des: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Ultra Prism Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
2017.tpci.product.summer.tin.name: Pokémon TCG: Island Guardians Tin
2017.tpci.product.summer.tin.sell-text: Stand ready with the strange and fearsome Pokémon of Alola! Choose the electric mischief of Tapu Koko-GX or the relentless vines of Tapu Bulu-GX in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Island Guardians Tin. Each of these beautiful tins contains all the astonishing power of a strange and mysterious Pokémon-GX who stands as a defender of the land!
2017.tpci.product.summer.tin.tagline: Stand Strong with the Island Guardians!
2017.tpci.product.team-skull.pin.collect: Pokémon TCG: Team Skull Pin Collection
2017.tpci.product.tk10.description: The Easy Way to Learn and Play! Master the art of Pokémon battling with your favorite Pokémon—one card at a time! The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon Trainer Kit—Lycanroc & Alolan Raichu gets you playing from the very first card you draw. And with fun and powerful Pokémon at your side, you’ll be a Pokémon Trainer before you know it! This kit contains everything you need to learn, train, and win! Play both decks against each other, then combine them to create one bigger deck where Lycanroc and Alolan Raichu battle side by side! Or test your deck at a Pokémon League near you and in the Pokémon TCG Online!
2017.tpci.product.tk10.name: Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon Trainer Kit—Lycanroc & Alolan Raichu
2017.tpci.product.ultrabeast.premium-col: Ultra Beasts GX Premium Collection Featuring Buzzwole and Xurkitree
Ultra Beasts GX Premium Collection Featuring Pheromosa and Celesteela
2017.tpci.product.xy6.3pk.b.3: Get in on great Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, 1 special holographic promo card featuring Regirock, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection!\n\nThese cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition.
2017.tpci.treecko.bundle.2: Add Treecko, Torchic, and Mudkip to Your Team!
2017.tpci.treecko.bundle.3: Small first partners can evolve into mighty battlers—a great addition to your collection! This bundle comes with a set of card sleeves and two 10-card booster packs from the Pokémon TCG: XY—Flashfire expansion!
2017.tpci.treecko.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 1 foil Treecko Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY36) 1 foil Torchic Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY37) 1 foil Mudkip Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY38) 2 Pokémon TCG: XY—Flashfire booster packs (10-card) Card sleeves These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through September 19, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.

2018.tpci.product.sp18.tindeck.dawnwings: The star Pokémon-GX, plus Lunala, Bewear, Rayquaza, and Oranguru—prepare for a ferocious battle with strong Trainer support and big hits!
2018.tpci.product.sp18.tindeck.duskmanen: The star Pokémon-GX, plus Magnezone, Bewear, Registeel, Heatran, and great Trainer cards! Get ready for some heavy metal action with this one!

cakefaq.faqeight.answer: We do not currently have any plans to support cards released earlier than HeartGold & SoulSilver at this time. We are always endeavoring to grow the Pokémon TCG Online experience, and as new features and content are added, we will be sure to keep the community aware of these.
cakefaq.faqeight.question: 8. When will I be able to use cards from Platinum or earlier expansions in the Pokémon TCG Online?
cakefaq.faqfive.answer:
Try entering the code a second time.
\nIf the code was previously redeemed by our system, you will receive a message notifying you that the code has already been used. If you received a message saying the code redemption was successful, please check your Collection for the item.
\nIf you have completed all of the steps listed above and your bonus digital item is still not received, submit a support request ticket to our customer support team at the Pokémon Support Center website accessible by clicking here.
cakefaq.faqfive.question: 5. I entered a code, but it didn’t unlock the bonus digital item. What should I do?
cakefaq.faqfour.answer:
Code cards are included in specially marked theme decks and booster packs purchased in retail stores, and occasionally other special retail products. Each code card will unlock a bonus digital item for the Pokémon TCG Online based on what product that code card was packaged with (theme deck, booster pack, promo card, etc.).
\nOnce you have obtained a code card, log in to the Pokémon TCG Online and click the Shop & Redeem button, then Redeem Codes. Enter your codes here, and click the Claim Now button to redeem the code! That's it! Once you have successfully redeemed your code, your item will appear in your Collection, ready to use!
cakefaq.faqfour.question: 4. What are code cards, and how do I redeem them?
cakefaq.faqone.answer: The Pokémon TCG Online: Trainer Challenge is a single-player online game series in the Pokémon TCG Online. Challenge 12 computer opponents through three Leagues (Gold, Platinum, and City Championship), earning achievements and cards to add to your decks as you go. Begin your adventure with three free starter decks (Fire, Water, and Grass), and after defeating 8 opponents with each deck, you will gain access to the cards from that deck in the Deck Manager!
cakefaq.faqone.question: 1. What is the Pokémon TCG Online: Trainer Challenge?
cakefaq.faqseven.answer: Only Pokémon TCG products that are clearly marked with the “Online” logo will contain code cards. You will not be able to unlock the bonus digital item in the Pokémon TCG Online unless you have purchased the appropriately marked Pokémon TCG product. If the Pokémon TCG product you purchased is correctly marked but did not contain a code card, please submit a support request ticket to our customer support team at the Pokémon Support Center website accessible<color=0099FF><mouse=http://support.pokemon.com/> by clicking here</mouse></color>.
cakefaq.faqseven.question: 7. I bought a Pokémon TCG product at the store and there is no code card in it. What do I do?
cakefaq.faqsix.answer: There is no limit to the number of codes you may redeem, but each code may only be used once.
cakefaq.faqsix.question: 6. How many codes am I allowed to redeem?
cakefaq.faqthree.answer:
There are many ways to get more cards in the Pokémon TCG Online!
- After defeating 8 opponents with a Basic color theme deck, you will gain access to the cards from that deck in the Deck Manager!
- Booster packs can be earned in the Pokémon TCG Online: Trainer Challenge by defeating 12 Trainers with any theme deck!
- Also in the Pokémon TCG Online: Trainer Challenge, achieving a 4-star rating against a Trainer will earn booster packs!
- Specially marked theme decks or booster packs purchased in retail stores include a code card that can be redeemed in our Shop to unlock a digital theme deck or booster pack!
- You may also redeem Tokens or Gems in our Shop for digital theme decks and booster packs to use in the Pokémon TCG Online!
- You will even earn booster packs periodically just for returning to the Pokémon TCG Online via the Daily Bonus!
cakefaq.faqthree.question: 3. How do I get more cards?
cakefaq.faqtwo.answer: Achievements are unlocked upon completing certain gameplay goals.
cakefaq.faqtwo.question: 2. How do I earn achievements?

Magikarp's Revenge
Unlock the potential of little Magikarp and the power of the raging seas! This deck features Shiny Gyarados-EX and Regice, plus Splash Energy and some great Trainer cards!
This deck is ready for battle anytime! Enter the ring with big brawlers like Machamp-EX and Marowak, plus Strong Energy and some great Trainer cards!
Get ready for a Shatter Shot showdown with Mewtwo-EX and Meowstic in this energetic deck, with the help of Mystery Energy and some great Trainer cards!
With Xerneas-EX leading the charge, you can use the Sky Field Stadium card to keep even more Pokémon types in play and hit hard with Rainbow Force. It's a team effort!
Rainbow Team
Yveltal-EX is brewing up a victory, using Max Elixir to fuel its Evil Ball attack for big damage. Draw lots of cards to turn Noctowl's High Flight into a power attack! Time to prowl!
Night Prowl
With lots of Stadium cards, Zygarde-EX can dish out quick damage, while Trainer cards and Mamoswine's Ability reduce your opponent's damage to a trickle. Stay strong!
Power Arsenal
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.decks.pcds: Main Pokémon: Articuno, Gyarados, Lapras\nChill your opponent to the bone with this Water-type deck! Articuno can find Energy and then let loose a Freezing Wind attack. Gyarados can hit the opposing Pokémon hard and weaken every other Pokémon in play with a Berserker Splash. Lapras helps out by fetching from your deck the exact Trainer card you need! Add some awesome Trainer and Energy cards like Max Revive and Splash Energy to keep your deck strong for the long battle, and this deck displays the hidden power of the deeps!

Main Pokémon: Articuno, Gyarados, Lapras\nChill your opponent to the bone with this Water-type deck! Articuno can find Energy and then let loose a Freezing Wind attack. Gyarados can hit the opposing Pokémon hard and weaken every other Pokémon in play with a Berserker Splash. Lapras helps out by fetching from your deck the exact Trainer card you need! Add some awesome Trainer and Energy cards like Max Revive and Splash Energy to keep your deck strong for the long battle, and this deck displays the hidden power of the deeps!

Main Pokémon: Butterfree, Meganium, Torterra \nThis deck has plenty of punch mixed with healing! Meganium's Giant Bloom does 60 damage for {G}{C}{C} and heals 20 damage, and Torterra's Giga Drain attack does 40 damage for {G}{C}{C} and heals the damage done. Wigglytuff has 90 HP, and when it uses Expand, it reduces damage to itself on the next turn. It may look a little softer than the HS: Basic Blue or HS: Basic Red decks, but the staying power of Grass will outlast your opponent!

Main Pokémon: Conkeldurr, Gigalith, Throh \nThe new BW: Basic Orange deck is ready to deliver a Knock Out blow! This furious Fighting-type deck features Throh, Conkeldurr, and the mighty mighty Gigalith for hard-hitting power! Throh has a Circle Throw to force your opponent to switch Active Pokémon, or a Storm Throw for 80 damage not affected by Resistance! And Gigalith's Shear attack attaches Energy to it, and Rock Bullet does 20 more damage for every {F} Energy attached: building power! Conkeldurr brings the amazing Craftsmanship Ability to give Fighting-type Pokémon +20 HP for every {F} Energy attached—this is a deck that can take a hit and just…Keeps…GOING!

Main Pokémon: Moltres, Ninetales, Arcanine\nBurn it up with this Fire-type deck! Arcanine and Rapidash have big attacks that discard Energy—attach a Burning Energy so it comes right back, or use an Energy Retrieval Trainer card. Moltres is a giant Basic Pokémon that can deliver huge damage at the cost of hitting itself. And when Ninetales attacks with Flickering Flames, the hypnotic effect leaves your opponent's Pokémon Asleep. With Trainer cards like Scorched Earth and Professor Sycamore to keep your hand fired up, you can really bring on the heat!

Main Pokémon: Moltres, Ninetales, Arcanine\nBurn it up with this Fire-type deck! Arcanine and Rapidash have big attacks that discard Energy—attach a Burning Energy so it comes right back, or use an Energy Retrieval Trainer card. Moltres is a giant Basic Pokémon that can deliver huge damage at the cost of hitting itself. And when Ninetales attacks with Flickering Flames, the hypnotic effect leaves your opponent's Pokémon Asleep. With Trainer cards like Scorched Earth and Professor Sycamore to keep your hand fired up, you can really bring on the heat!

Main Pokémon: Zapdos, Raichu, Kangaskhan\nThis Lightning-type deck is a rolling slugfest! Kangaskhan brings the big hits while Zapdos unleashes its Raging Thunder. Raticate can leave your opponent's Pokémon Poisoned, but they can't return the favor because it's immune to Special Conditions. With an extra-full Bench thanks to the Sky Field Stadium card, Raichu's Circle Circuit attack can hit for tons of damage! Finally, Trainer cards like Potion and Pokémon Fan Club can keep you in the game, and Double Colorless Energy can power up your Pokémon fast!

Main Pokémon: Zapdos, Raichu, Kangaskhan\nThis Lightning-type deck is a rolling slugfest! Kangaskhan brings the big hits while Zapdos unleashes its Raging Thunder. Raticate can leave your opponent's Pokémon Poisoned, but they can't return the favor because it's immune to Special Conditions. With an extra-full Bench thanks to the Sky Field Stadium card, Raichu's Circle Circuit attack can hit for tons of damage! Finally, Trainer cards like Potion and Pokémon Fan Club can keep you in the game, and Double Colorless Energy can power up your Pokémon fast!

Rule the battle with the Legendary Pokémon of order and control: Zygarde! With Lucario's fists of justice and Serperior's crushing coils, you'll bring order to chaos and seize the moment with the Battle Ruler theme deck. On to victory!

Your opponents will soon find themselves in troubled waters with the Blue Assault theme deck, especially when you unleash Galvantula! Its Electroweb attack is sure to leave them in sticky situations, and its Leech Life attack will keep your own Pokémon going strong! Use Basculin's Crunch attack to leave your opponent's Pokémon high and dry while Professor Juniper brings you calm waters. Will you be able to batter the opposition with the Blue Assault theme deck?

Lightning and water make a dangerous combination—for your opponents! Galvantula can spin a bright Electroweb, while Heliolisk powers up its Parabolic Spark. At the same time, Kingler can drop the big Crabhammer, and Feraligatr's Hyper Whirlpool is ready to pull the foe under. To maximize your odds, Frillish and Jellicent confuse and befuddle opposing Pokémon—sometimes the path to victory takes a few twists and turns, and sometimes you can bolt to the top!

Lightning strikes and fires rage when you bring the Brilliant Thunder theme deck to battle! Harness the might of Pidgeot's Strong Gust to deliver booming blows to your foes. Bring your opponents to their knees as you buffet them with the thunderous strike force of Lopunny and Heliolisk! Fuel the ferocious flames with Fiery Torch and, as the sky begins to fall on your adversaries, deliver the final word with Snorlax's Sleepy Press! As the smoke clears, will you leave your opponents thunderstruck?
Let Sparks Fly!\nRun circles around your opponent's Pokémon with lightning speed, or burn them with a well-placed jet of flame—let loose with the full heat of the Burning Spark theme deck!

Carry a fiery storm under your wings with the Burning Winds theme deck! Let Talonflame light up the sky with Jet Shoot, while Venomoth stirs up a Dizzying Wind to keep a foe guessing—and with Yanmega's Windfall to refill your hand, you can fly the unfriendly skies with ease. Add in Pyroar's Flare Command and Loudred's Energy Press to turn your opponent's resources in your favor, and total air superiority could be yours!

The chaotic powers that have been unleashed can only be controlled by an amazing Pokémon Trainer. Is it you? In the Chaos Control theme deck, you'll need to balance devastating attacks like Tyranitar's Tail Crush and Lucario's Bulk Up against more strategic approaches like Mismagius's Psychic Pulse. With all of your opponent's Pokémon vulnerable to your battle plans, can you control your forces until victory is yours?

Watch foes feel the heat as White Kyurem sets your game ablaze in the Cold Fire theme deck! Send opponents on a slippery downward spiral with Samurott's Destructive Whirlpool attack, and run rings around them as they try to fend off Darmanitan's ferocious Damage Counterpunch attack. And, with Delibird, Delcatty, and Dunsparce delivering you deck-searching delights to drive the flames ever higher, your opponents will be going out…but not in a blaze of glory!

Bring the hammer down with the Dark Hammer theme deck! Get your hardest hitters into battle-ready mode quickly with handy Trainer cards like Evosoda and Korrina. Mienshao pulls a tricky hit-and-run as Pangoro hammers away at your opponent's deck. Landorus keeps your team powered up with Energy, and Professor Sycamore refills your hand. With Machamp's Fighting Fury Ability to boost your attacks, your opponent could be in for a dark fate!

Mewtwo and Darkrai go head to head in the new Pokémon TCG Battle Arena Decks! These two 60-card decks are ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer! Each deck is led by an exceptional Pokémon-EX and includes 10 foil cards. Let the battle begin!

You'll use every trick under the sun to defeat your opponent when you play the Daybreak theme deck! The versatile Sludge Pokémon Muk both inflicts Special Conditions on your opponent's Pokémon and then adds on damage to those already affected. And when the Sun Pokémon Espeon begins to move damage counters from your Pokémon across the battlefield to your opponent's Pokémon, it will dawn on your opponent just how versatile your Daybreak deck really is!

A Swift Strike of Darkness! \nLeave your opponents in the dust with the Destruction Rush theme deck! Yveltal retrieves lost Energy for a quick recovery with Oblivion Wing and wields the devastating Darkness Blade to great effect. Krookodile can Knock Back a battle-ready Pokémon to the Bench and keep powerful Supporter cards out of play. With Malamar's Mental Panic to keep your opponent's attacks at bay, retaliation won't be easy—and the rush to destruction will be complete!

When dragons snarl, opponents fall! With the DragonSnarl theme deck, Pokémon like Skuntank, Golurk, and Gothitelle lead the charge and pave the way for your powerhouse Dragon-type Pokémon, Hydreigon, to roar into battle! As the Brutal Pokémon brings its aggressive combination of healing and devastating attacks to combat, your opponents will hear their defeat because they hear your dragons snarl!

Foes must make way for the mighty Mach Pokémon Garchomp or quickly learn a furious lesson! But time and tide wait for no Pokémon, and your opponents will have much to fear before that terrible arrival: Walrein will bring watery doom, speedily delivering wave after wave of Aurora Beam and Ice Entomb attacks…and there will be no respite when Marowak gets in on the action with its heavy-hitting Vortex Chop! With nowhere to run and no time to catch breath, can anyone match the dragons' speed?

Shake the pillars of the Pokémon world with the Earth's Pulse theme deck! The Continent Pokémon Groudon leads the charge, breaking ground on a massive scale, while little Linoone rushes your opponent's Bench with a Dash Attack! Medicham's Ω Barrage Ancient Trait brings an extra hit every turn, while unexpected allies like Eelektrik and Electrike turn up the voltage with Buzz Flip and Charge! Smash 'em with Fighting, zap 'em with Lightning, and leave your opponent shocked, socked, and pulverized!

Eyes on the Prize!\nCommand the gleaming eyes of Luxray and strike fast with the crackling fists of Electivire! Stare down your opponent with the hypnotic mastery and total focus of the Electric Eye theme deck!

The greatest fires begin with a single spark...and the Ember Spark theme deck will fan your flames of victory! Use Noctowl to add extra cards to your hand so you can build up the Energy to let Arcanine and Typhlosion use their impressive Fire Mane and Fire Spin attacks for 90 and 120 damage! By drawing and discarding at lightning speed, you'll burn through your opponent's defenses in no time!

Disrupt your opponent's strategy and protect your team with the Enchanted Echo theme deck! With Sylveon to keep Energy away from opposing Pokémon and Tornadus to shove them back to the Bench, your path will be clear to dish out the hits. Add in the damage prevention of Clefable and Accelgor, plus the healing powers of Victreebel and Potion, and your victory could echo through the ages!

Attack after devastating attack, you'll drive your opponents to the edge of defeat when you play the Explosive Edge theme deck! With Reshiram's fiery Blue Flare attack and Beartic's powerful Ambush attack, you'll blast your opponent's Pokémon turn after turn. And when Chandelure and Arcanine add even more cutting-edge attacks to your battles, you can expect every victory to be exceptional!

Dazzle your opponents with the Fast Daze theme deck! With its low-cost attacks and no Retreat Cost, Accelgor can get in and out of battle in the blink of an eye! Volcarona's Fiery Dance powers up your best attacks with blazing speed, and Lilligant's healing touch can get your quickest fighters back into the fray! You could be on the fast track to success!

Send in the cavalry with the Furious Knights theme deck! Quick hitters like Emolga give you time to marshal your forces, and the slow and sturdy Escavalier can dish out the damage while protecting itself. Plus, Druddigon's Rough Skin Ability will make your opponent think twice about attacking! In a furious battle, victory could be yours!

Spin up a great engine of battle with the Mythical Pokémon Volcanion! Combine the steely determination of Klinklang with the leaping speed of Monferno, and seize the power of steam. All aboard the victory train!

Play the Green Tornado theme deck to blow away the opposition while sheltering your own Pokémon with Serperior's Leaf Storm attack! Then, bring Sawsbuck into the action and overwhelm your opponent's Pokémon with its "the greener, the meaner" Nature Power attack! And if your opponents can weather the storm with tough Pokémon, let them ride it out in peaceful slumbers with Musharna's Hypnotic Ray attack! With the Green Tornado theme deck, will you whirl your way to victory?

Your victories will be in full bloom when you battle using the Growth Clash theme deck! Furret helps you find the Pokémon you need, Sandslash batters the Defending Pokémon with Poison Sting, and Meganium uses Giant Bloom to both attack your opponent's Pokémon and heal itself at the same time. Can you wield the furious powers of these Pokémon to grow stronger and defeat your opponents?

At last, three great Pokémon-EX from the highest heights and strange new worlds! Choose the sky-high swiftness of Rayquaza-EX, the soaring speed of Latios-EX, or the mystical fury of Hoopa-EX in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Powers Beyond Tin! Each of these rugged tins contains a Legendary or Mythical Pokémon-EX for your collection, so make friends with one of these powerful Pokémon today!

Feel the chill as Black Kyurem takes center stage in the electrifying Ice Shock theme deck! Foes have no time to stop and stare as Black Kyurem unleashes its electrifying Flash Freeze attack, and with Jellicent's Stickiness Ability, they won't even be able to run and hide! The jolts continue as Lopunny takes time out from healing to drive the Defending Pokémon back to the Bench, helping Electivire blow your opponents' fuses as it delivers punishing attacks to Benched Pokémon. Can those who stand in your way avoid the blackout?

Fury of Waves, Song of Steel! \nCrush your opponents with iron or sink them in the depths—either way you wield the chilling might of the Iron Tide theme deck! With Metagross leading the way, this deck shines like steel from the start. Add in some big attacks like Forbidden Iron Hammer from Registeel and Hydro Splash from Vaporeon, and your opponent is awash in trouble, bubbles, and a steely doom! Then evolve Magikarp to Gyarados to truly thrash opposing Pokémon, and watch the tide of the battle turn in your favor!

At last, three great Pokémon-EX from the highest heights and strange new worlds! Choose the sky-high swiftness of Rayquaza-EX, the soaring speed of Latios-EX, or the mystical fury of Hoopa-EX in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Powers Beyond Tin! Each of these rugged tins contains a Legendary or Mythical Pokémon-EX for your collection, so make friends with one of these powerful Pokémon today!

Main Pokémon: Gallade, Miltank, Swoobat\nDemonstrate your crushing brainpower with the Mental Might deck! Its three star players work together in a terrific trio. Swoobat's Energy Gift lends extra power to Gallade's Powerful Storm attack, and when Gallade is on your Bench, Miltank's Powerful Friends attack wallops your foe with 80 damage for just 1 {C} Energy! With this kind of teamwork, plus plenty of useful Trainer cards, your psychic powers could prevail!

Mewtwo and Darkrai go head to head in the new Pokémon TCG Battle Arena Decks! These two 60-card decks are ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer! Each deck is led by an exceptional Pokémon-EX and includes 10 foil cards. Let the battle begin!
Mewtwo is ready to dish out the chaos! With Hitmonchan and Onix delivering quick hits, this deck clobbers both body and mind. You'll be right in the thick of the action!

Let the waves wash over your opponents when you play the Mind Flood theme deck! While Hypno spends turn after turn putting your opponent's Pokémon to sleep, Exeggutor's Big Eggsplosion attack washes away your opponent's hopes of victory with the potential for tons of damage. To top it off, Feraligatr roars in with its Spinning Tail attack to flood your opponent's side of the battle with damage!

It never rains but it pours for your opponent when you bring the Mystic Typhoon theme deck to battle! Muddle your opponents' minds with Meowstic's Ear Influence attack, and turn a tide of damage upon them with Walrein's Big Tusk! Keep the Energy flowing with Milotic's sacrificial Energy Grace Ability, and dig up more cards to create the perfect storm with Furret's Buried Treasure Hunt before unleashing waves of fury boosted by the Muscle Band Trainer card. Can anyone weather your storms?

Who's afraid of the dark? Your opponent will be when you play the Nightfall theme deck. Powerful Pokémon with devastating attacks prowl the shadows: Metagross can do as much as 200 damage in one attack, Honchkrow takes advantage of your defeated Darkness Pokémon to do even more damage, and the Moonlight Pokémon Umbreon can do fearsome damage while protecting itself with its Moonlight Fang attack. When night falls, so will your opponent's Pokémon!

When you play the Pokémon TCG: Night Hunter theme deck, your opponents become the hunted! While Zoroark uses its Fury Swipes attack to stalk its next target, Excadrill zeroes in on the Defending Pokémon with its predatory Drill Run attack. Your opponents will learn to dread the night when you unleash the Night Hunter theme deck!
Sound a Victory Cry!\nLet rip with a scream from the night, and weave your path to victory in the darkness. Seize the power of Noivern and Gengar in the Night Striker theme deck!

Opposites working together create a furious maelstrom! The Ocean's Core theme deck brings together the raging Ocean Cyclone of Kyogre and the blazing inferno of Combusken. Thanks to its α Growth Ancient Trait, Whiscash can power up fast to unleash a fearsome Earthquake, while Milotic uses Aqua Swirl to put your opponent's big attackers on the Bench! So take a shot with this medley of Fire and Water—because when the ocean burns, nothing can stop you!

Charge up your game with the little thunderbolt that never gives up: Pikachu! Add the electrifying power of Raichu and the supercharged voltage of Electabuzz, and you'll have a potent team against any foe!

Lightning strikes and opponents feel the burn as the Cave Dragon Pokémon Druddigon explodes into action with the ferocious Dragon Claw attack! Infernape's Malevolent Fire attack fans the flames of your foes' defeat, and there's no skin thick enough to cope with Sharpedo's Rough Skin Ability. Once Jellicent drifts into range and its Spiteful Spirit Ability takes hold, even opponents with the cloudiest of minds will know the truth: they can't claw their way back into the game when you play the Plasma Claw theme deck!

Shadows loom and sparks fly as the Renegade Pokémon Giratina lays a Hex on any Pokémon that stands against it! A devastating chain reaction becomes a terrifying reality once Amoonguss gets in on the action with its damage-boosting Miracle Powder attack, and a shocking aftermath is inescapable once Weezing unleashes its Aftermath attack. Finally, as Watchog shows its teeth and snaps around the heels of fleeing Pokémon with its Second Bite attack, what once was murky will become blindingly clear: you'll cast a shadow over your foes with the Plasma Shadow theme deck!

Heavy hitters deliver pure power: it's up to you to control it! Gigalith rumbles into action with the Rock Bullet attack, and the Intimidation Pokémon Krookodile can make other Pokémon pull their punches every time it uses its sneaky Black Eyes Ability. Your opponents will be on the ropes as even little Minccino gets in on the action, packing a mighty punch for its mini size. With Pokémon chosen for their fighting fury, can your foes handle your power plays?

Main Pokémon: Raichu, Haxorus, Eelektrik \nElectrify your game and shock your opponents when you play the Power Relay theme deck! Foes will find themselves ferociously short-circuited when Raichu unleashes its Slam attack and, if that doesn't blow their fuses, Haxorus will prove that lightning strikes twice with the stunning power of its Dual Chop and Giga Impact attacks. Eelektrik uses its Dynamotor Ability to find Energy and keep the current flowing, and a selection of Supporter cards ensures that your opposition won't be able to handle the static for long before the power goes out…permanently!

Mash your opponents' minds with mental might when you play the Psy Crusher theme deck! Use Leafeon's Energy Crush attack to turn the power of opposing Pokémon on themselves, and make sure no Pokémon can escape when you unleash Cofagrigus's Elongating Arms attack! Espeon keeps the reinforcements coming with Psy Alert, and Muk deals damage and heals itself. Then, when Beedrill Confuses and Poisons using Swift Sting, it won't take a mind-reader to know that the shattered remnants of the forces facing you have been crushed!

The Coffin Pokémon Cofagrigus rises to do your bidding when you play the Raiders theme deck! Send Sableye to raid your discard pile for Item cards that, when you discard them from your hand, let Cofagrigus bury your opponent's Pokémon with damage. Then send Krookodile in with its Dark Clamp and Bombast attacks to pin down the Defending Pokémon before enshrouding it in darkness in search of a Knock Out. Prove that you are skilled enough to ensure that your raiders become victors!

Rally your forces and charge into battle with the Rallying Cry promo deck! Wigglytuff, Exploud, and Palpitoad combine their voices in an extra-powerful Round attack. Cheren and Cilan support your troops with extra cards and Energy, and if you fall behind, Kangaskhan can sound a Call for Family to get more Pokémon into play. This is one cry your opponents won't be able to ignore!

Rayquaza-EX teams up with Zekrom, Zapdos, and Raichu to make this Battle Arena Deck a contender! You'll also find powerful Trainer cards such as Archie's Ace in the Hole, N, and the never-before-seen Karen!

At last, three great Pokémon-EX from the highest heights and strange new worlds! Choose the sky-high swiftness of Rayquaza-EX, the soaring speed of Latios-EX, or the mystical fury of Hoopa-EX in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Powers Beyond Tin! Each of these rugged tins contains a Legendary or Mythical Pokémon-EX for your collection, so make friends with one of these powerful Pokémon today!

With the Recon theme deck, you'll help your opponent discover what every good lookout knows—there's no smoke without fire. And where there's fire, there's Magmortar! Survey the destruction as its Mantle Bazooka attack does 100 damage to anything in its path. Meganium ensures opposing Pokémon are caught sleeping on their watch, and relentlessly test your foe's defenses with Tangrowth's slow-burning Grind attack... Then, watch as its crushing crescendo reminds your opposition just what the lay of the land really is!

Unleash a firestorm in the Red Frenzy theme deck with the mighty Mega Fire Pig Pokémon Emboar! Feeling burned out after its tremendous Flare Blitz attack? Well, fan the flames with the Energy Retrieval Trainer card and reignite with Emboar's Heat Crash attack! Then, add fuel to the fire and insult to injury with Stoutland's Giga Impact attack! Let your opponents feel the heat when you play the Red Frenzy theme deck!

A Strong Shield of Energy! \nResist, refuel, and retaliate with the Resilient Life theme deck! Xerneas can find Fairy Energy to recharge your Benched Pokémon, and Aromatisse moves that Energy around to wherever you need it most. Once your Pokémon have Fairy Energy attached, things get even better: Slurpuff's Sweet Veil Ability protects them from Special Conditions, and the Fairy Garden Stadium card lets them retreat for free! Flexible defenses are the key to your victory!

Set your opponents reeling with ferocious counterattacks when you play the Retort theme deck! While Groudon builds its powerful Volcano Stomp attack from your Bench, Hitmontop's rapid response is its Triple Kick attack that can do 60 damage for only 1 Energy! And if your opponent thinks that sending your Pokémon to the Lost Zone is a good strategy, Lucario has a stunning answer to that with its Dimension Sphere attack. The Retort theme deck could be the answer to your victory!

Bring forth lightning and psychic shocks with the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa! Galvantula's electric webs and the surging power of Ampharos keep the current flowing and give your opponent quite a shock. Call down the thunder!

Let Nidoking lead from the front and unleash its devastating Venomous Horn attack to punish and Poison your foe's Pokémon! Then, bring the opposition to its knees as Machamp steps up to deliver your crowning achievement with its majestic Hundred Furious Punches attack... And, if revolution is in the air, the Twins Supporter card will help crush any challenge to your sovereignty by rewarding you with extra cards! Will your rule be absolute with the Royal Guard theme deck?

Keldeo-EX teams up with Blastoise, Milotic, and Articuno to give this Battle Arena Deck a real kick! You'll also find powerful Trainer cards such as Float Stone, Battle Compressor, and the never-before-seen Karen!

When Zoroark emerges from the shadows, there won't be a shadow of a doubt about who will win! Even if Zoroark takes a hit or two, its Dark Rush attack does more damage for each damage counter on it. And while Empoleon uses its Diving Draw Ability to give you greater access to your deck, your other Pokémon can use their fast and effective attacks to do damage, cause Confusion, and then put out your opponent's lights. Make your opponents afraid of their own shadows when you play the Shadows theme deck!

Unleash a storm of battle with the Legendary Pokémon of the seas: Lugia! With the fiery wings of Moltres and the mystic flame of Delphox, you'll burn through opposition in a flash with the Sky Guardian theme deck. Light it up!

The valiant Sun Pokémon Volcarona commands the battlefield in the Solar Strike theme deck! As it torments your opponents with the Leech Life attack and calls reinforcements with Solar Transporter, Glalie and Ursaring move into position for their own fiendish offensive, and Blastoise's Deluge Ability ensures your attacks have the Energy they need. It won't be long before your foes are blinded by your brilliance!

The best offense is a strong defense when you play the Steel Sentinel theme deck! Steelix's Guard Press attack reduces the damage your opponent can do...Cherrim's Sunny Heal Poké-Power heals your Active Pokémon turn after turn...Life Herb can do wonders to help your Pokémon last longer...and even Turtwig's Leech Seed attack heals Turtwig whenever it does damage to your opponent's Pokémon! Can you stand strong against all attackers?

Strength of Spirit, Strength of Stone! \nThis deck's got heart—the kind of prizefighter's heart that never quits! With the Stone Heart theme deck, your Pokémon can poison, paralyze, and trick opposing Pokémon in many ways—and the mighty Regirock leads the way, with its Unyielding Rock attack perfect for taking down Pokémon-EX! Add in the Legendary Pokémon Virizion with the power to hit harder if you're behind, and the Stone Heart deck is full of fighting spirit. This is one contender that's never down for the count!

Turn the tables on your opponents with the Toxic Tricks theme deck! Gothitelle's Mental Shock attack will confuse and confound your opponents, and Scolipede's poisonous double-dose Toxic Claws attack will leave your opponents feeling more than a little tricked! And, when Gothita gets in the mix with its sleep-inducing Hypnotic Gaze, your opponents will be Poisoned, Asleep, Confused, and beaten in no time!

Send shivers down your opponent's spine and spread the damage around with Mamoswine's chilling Snowstorm attack! Then, let your foes know they've been given the cold shoulder, and cause panic to take root as Kricketune sows Confusion before delivering its mighty Fury Cutter attack! And, if it looks like you've been cut down to size, support comes from the Black Belt Trainer card, which causes hefty bonus damage! Can the Verdant Frost theme deck make the grass greener on your side?

Get ready to watch your opponents spin out of control! The Voltage Vortex theme deck will shock them with every attack—from Zekrom's Bolt Strike to Luxray's Flash Impact…and beyond! Add the possibility of 160 damage when Raichu charges up its Slam attack, and your opponents will be waiting for the next jolt—your exciting victory!
Call the Ocean's Fury!\nCut through waves and slash foes in the battle arena—flow like water and bend like grass! Greninja and Slowking come to your call in the Wave Slasher theme deck!

Start your adventure in the Kalos region with the Water-type Pokémon Froakie and this 60-card ready-to-play deck! This new deck leaps over the competition with Froakie's unexpected powers, including all the shifting speed and thrilling moves that Water-type Pokémon are famous for! Move like a roaring river and carve your channel to victory—grab the Froakie deck and get ready to play!

Start your adventure in the Kalos region with the Grass-type Pokémon Chespin and this 60-card ready-to-play deck! With spikes, toughness, and resilient Grass-type moves, this new deck is perfect for the small but fierce competitor who never gives up! With quiet strength, it grows and grows to outperform and outlast the competition! Plant the seeds of your future victory—start with the Chespin deck!

It never rains but it pours for your opponent when you bring the Mystic Typhoon theme deck to battle! Muddle your opponents' minds with Meowstic's Ear Influence attack, and turn a tide of damage upon them with Walrein's Big Tusk! Keep the Energy flowing with Milotic's sacrificial Energy Grace Ability, and dig up more cards to create the perfect storm with Furret's Buried Treasure Hunt before unleashing waves of fury boosted by the Muscle Band Trainer card. Can anyone weather your storms?

Play the Mindbind theme deck and watch your opponents as their dreams are crushed and their minds are broken! As the Intertwining Pokémon Sylveon leaves foes in a tangle with its Fairy Wind attack, Noivern will wait in the wings with the second wave before unleashing its Second Bite attack. Ensnare your opposition with the Mindbind theme deck!
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.decks.tind: With Xerneas-EX leading the charge, you can use the Sky Field Stadium card to keep even more Pokémon types in play and hit hard with Rainbow Force. It's a team effort!
Yveltal-EX is brewing up a victory, using Max Elixir to fuel its Evil Ball attack for big damage. Draw lots of cards to turn Noctowl's High Flight into a power attack! Time to prowl!
With lots of Stadium cards, Zygarde-EX can dish out quick damage, while Trainer cards and Mamoswine's Ability reduce your opponent's damage to a trickle. Stay strong!
