landing.trainertip.0: You can redeem your code cards in the Shop.
landing.trainertip.1: No employee of The Pokémon Company International will ever ask you for your password.
landing.trainertip.10: If you win 7 games with any of the Basic decks in the Trainer Challenge, you unlock that deck for PvP play, and you can use the cards in it to build other decks.
landing.trainertip.11: Trainer Tokens can be redeemed in the Shop for booster packs and theme decks.
landing.trainertip.12: The Standard format uses only the latest card sets.
landing.trainertip.13: When you create a new deck in the Deck Manager, you can choose to make it a Standard deck or an Unlimited deck.
landing.trainertip.14: You can build your own custom deck in the Deck Manager.
landing.trainertip.15: Code cards that you can redeem for digital products come from specially marked products where Pokémon cards are sold.
landing.trainertip.16: You can trade cards and unopened booster packs to other players in the Trading area.
landing.trainertip.17: The Unlimited format uses all cards available in the Pokémon TCG Online.
landing.trainertip.18: You can go to PokemonTCG.com to get information about the game.
landing.trainertip.19: The Unlimited format uses all cards available in the Pokémon TCG Online.
landing.trainertip.2: For the first PvP game you play each day, you will get a bonus 10 Trainer Tokens.
landing.trainertip.20: Before you accept a trade, always double-check to make sure you know what you are giving and getting.
landing.trainertip.21: You can earn additional prizes—Trainer Tokens and even booster packs—by replaying the Trainer Challenge.
landing.trainertip.22: If you take all 6 of your Prize cards, you win the game.
landing.trainertip.23: If you Knock Out your opponent's last Pokémon, you win the game.
landing.trainertip.24: If your opponent can't draw a card at the beginning of their turn, you win the game.
landing.trainertip.27: If a Pokémon is Asleep, it cannot attack or retreat.
landing.trainertip.28: Some attacks leave the Active Pokémon Asleep, Burned, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned—these are called "Special Conditions."
landing.trainertip.29: If a Pokémon is Burned, it may take damage between turns.
landing.trainertip.3: If a Confused Pokémon tries to attack, it may damage itself instead.
landing.trainertip.30: A Paralyzed Pokémon cannot attack or retreat.
landing.trainertip.31: A Poisoned Pokémon takes damage between turns.
landing.trainertip.32: Evolving a Pokémon or moving it to the Bench removes all Special Conditions.
landing.trainertip.33: Many Fire-type Pokémon are weak to Water-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.34: Many Grass-type Pokémon are weak to Fire-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.35: Many Water-type Pokémon are weak to Lightning-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.36: Many Lightning-type Pokémon are weak to Fighting-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.37: Many Psychic-type Pokémon are weak to other Psychic-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.38: Some Fighting-type Pokémon are weak to Psychic-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.39: Some Fighting-type Pokémon are weak to Water-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.4: Some Fighting-type Pokémon are weak to Grass-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.40: Many Darkness-type Pokémon are weak to Fighting-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.41: Many Metal-type Pokémon are weak to Fire-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.42: Many Metal-type Pokémon are weak to Fire-type Pokémon.
landing.trainertip.43: Looking for more cards? Visit the Shop!
landing.trainertip.44: Always be respectful toward fellow players.
landing.trainertip.45: Check out Pokemon.com or the forums at Pokemon.com/tcgo for deck-building strategies.
landing.trainertip.46: You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn (before your attack).
landing.trainertip.47: Give us your thoughts on how we're doing and things you'd like to see in the game in the Forums at PokemonTCG.com.
landing.trainertip.48: User Experience can be toggled on and off in the Options Menu.
landing.trainertip.49: Found a bug? Log in at www.pokemon.com/support and click Ask a Question to report it!
landing.trainertip.5: You may play as many Item cards as you like during your turn (before your attack).
landing.trainertip.50: Always be respectful toward fellow players.
landing.trainertip.6: Always be respectful toward fellow players.
landing.trainertip.7: Found a bug? Log in at www.pokemon.com/support and click Ask a Question to report it!
landing.trainertip.8: User Experience can be toggled on and off in the Options Menu.
landing.trainertip.9: Give us your thoughts on how we're doing and things you'd like to see in the game in the Forums at PokemonTCG.com.

newuserexperience.collectionscene.packop: Your journey into the Pokémon TCG Online is off to a great start! You can navigate anywhere from the Home screen.
newuserexperience.deckunlock.title: Deck Upgraded
newuserexperience.firstimeexperience.ach: There are all sorts of activities you can do in the game to earn more.
You can view all of these achievements in your profile.
newuserexperience.firstimeexperience.boo: Hey! You just got a booster pack!
I sure hope it's a good one.
Go to your Collection to open it.
newuserexperience.firstimeexperience.tok: Congratulations! You've just finished your first game. Here's a Trainer Token as a reward. You can redeem Trainer Tokens for cards, accessories, or avatar items in the Shop!
Once you get enough of those, you can redeem them for cool stuff like booster packs and theme decks in the Shop.
You might already have some from playing games on Pokemon.com.
With that win, you've unlocked a card for your deck! Win 7 games with a Basic deck to unlock all of the cards and earn it in your collection!
newuserexperience.firsttcwin.title: Congratulations!
newuserexperience.firsttimeexperience.fi: Congratulations! You just won a game against someone who was favored! You get 2 bonus Trainer Tokens for doing that.
newuserexperience.firsttimeexperience.io: “Welcome to the Pokémon TCG Online for iPad! You'll recognize most of the game, but some of our controls are a little different.”
newuserexperience.firsttimeexperience.lo: Welcome to the Pokémon TCG Online!
“Welcome to the Pokémon TCG Online on Android! You'll recognize most of the game, but some of our controls are a little different.”
newuserexperience.firsttimelogin.ellagre: And I'm Ella! We're going to teach you how to play Pokémon!
If you Knock Out all of your opponent's Pokémon or take all of your Prize cards, you win!
newuserexperience.firsttimelogin.label: Welcome
newuserexperience.firsttimelogin.zachgre: In the Pokémon TCG, you'll battle your opponent's Pokémon with Pokémon of your own!
That's how you win. Let's get you into a game and show you more!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.deckbuilder: Here you can manage your decks for use in tournaments and PvP games.
There are 3 types of decks: Standard, Unlimited, and Theme Deck.
You can create Standard and Unlimited decks in the Deck Manager, as well as modify existing decks of both types!
We can also help you build your first deck. You choose your favorite Pokémon and we'll do the rest!
Now you can choose what you'd like to do. Have fun building your deck!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.firstvsgame: You might want to build a new deck for the next Versus game you play. Go to the Deck Manager and build a deck, or keep playing games to practice with the decks you have.
newuserexperience.fullscreen.goldleaguec: You've done it! You've won the Gold League! Congratulations!
You're definitely ready for bigger and better challenges. There are lots of great rewards waiting for you.
The Platinum League is now open! You can enter this league and challenge the other Trainers!
There is also Player vs. Player. Challenge your friends and other players to matches.
Or you can return to the Gold League to hone your Pokémon skills and try out new decks.
Now you can choose what you'd like to do. Enjoy your new challenges!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.pvpintro.di: One of the fun things about playing online is...
...you get to play against players from around the world.
You can always get back to this screen by selecting the lightning bolt button in the navigation bar.
Before you go, though, we have something to get you started.
A Trainer is only as good as their deck, so I want to make sure you have a very good deck to start with.
This is a "mighty" deck that you can use in PvP!
This is a mighty deck that you can use in Versus. It's got brains and brawn!
newuserexperience.fullscreen.quickplayre: Welcome back! Ready for another game?
newuserexperience.fullscreen.trainingint: Let me introduce you to some of the other Trainers. Play against them to earn rewards!
newuserexperience.guestlogin.label: Guest Login
newuserexperience.guestlogin.speechbubbl: Welcome to our game store! Let's play a game of Pokémon!
newuserexperience.guestlogin.tcwin01: This is the Trainer Challenge. Here you can play the first league in the Pokémon TCG Online: the Gold League!
newuserexperience.guestlogin.tcwin02: If you create a Pokémon Trainer Club account, you'll be able to collect cards, build decks, and compete against other Trainers!
newuserexperience.guestlogout.ella.speec: Thanks for playing with us today!
newuserexperience.guestlogout.speechbubb: Thanks for playing with us today! If you make an account, you'll be able to collect cards and build your own decks!
newuserexperience.guestlogout.zach.speec: If you make an account, you'll be able to collect cards and build your own decks!
newuserexperience.leavinggame.label: Leaving the Game?
newuserexperience.leavinggame.title: Leaving the Game
newuserexperience.productopening: Opening booster packs is exciting! You can earn more booster packs by playing games.
newuserexperience.quickgameintro.title: Quick Game
newuserexperience.quickplay.label: Introduction
newuserexperience.quickplayreentry.ellaq: Welcome back! Ready for another game?
newuserexperience.reentry.fs.title: Welcome Back to Quick Play
newuserexperience.reentry.tc.title: Welcome Back
newuserexperience.speechbubble1.text: Thank you for playing with us today!
newuserexperience.speechbubble10.text: Do you still want to leave?
newuserexperience.speechbubble2.text: I hope you had as much fun as we did!
newuserexperience.speechbubble3.text: Come back tomorrow, and you'll earn 25 Trainer Tokens!
newuserexperience.speechbubble4.text: Come back tomorrow, and you'll earn 5 booster packs!
newuserexperience.speechbubble5.text: These Trainer Tokens can be used to get more cards in the Shop for play online.
newuserexperience.speechbubble6.text: Every day you come back, there will be a new reward for you!
newuserexperience.speechbubble9.text: Let's get you right into a game!
newuserexperience.trainerchallengereentr: The Trainers have been excited to play you!
newuserexperience.trainingreferral.body: Check out the new Training mode! Learn to play and earn rewards!
newuserexperience.trainingscene.cardunlo: We've added this card to your deck. Now it's even better!
newuserexperience.trainingscene.reentry: Welcome back! Your next opponent is ready for you. Hit the Play! button to start.
Do you want to play again?
Or do you want to have another lesson with me?
By the way, if you think you're ready for the full game, you can unlock it in the Options menu.
newuserexperience.uniques.firstgamewin.s: I think you're ready to play some other Trainers.
There are 11 more games in the Gold League.
After you defeat each Trainer, the game will unlock the next.
Winning 8 games with the same deck against different opponents will unlock the deck and cards for PvP!
newuserexperience.uniques.seconddaylogin: Check your messages in the Social Tab in the upper-left menu.
I bet it's that 25 Trainer Token reward that Ella told you about.
Here are three more achievements to try for!
Get all three of these, and I'll give you a special prize.

playmat.gametip.asleep.body: While Asleep, a Pokémon cannot attack or retreat. Between turns, its owner flips a coin. If heads, the Pokémon wakes up.
playmat.gametip.burned.body: If your Pokémon is Burned, put a Burn marker on it. Between turns, flip a coin. If tails, put 2 damage counters on the Burned Pokémon.
playmat.gametip.burnedsm.body: If your Pokémon is Burned, put a Burn marker on it. Between turns, put 2 damage counters on the Burned Pokémon. Then, that Pokémon's owner flips a coin. If heads, the Pokémon returns to normal.
playmat.gametip.confused.body: If you attack with a Confused Pokémon, flip a coin. If tails, the attack does nothing, and put 3 damage counters on the Confused Pokémon.
playmat.gametip.discardpile.body: You may search your discard pile or your opponent's discard pile at any time.
playmat.gametip.evolution.body: When a Pokémon evolves, it keeps all its Energy and damage counters. Any Special Conditions are removed.
playmat.gametip.mustfliptoplaytrainer: You must flip heads to play a Trainer card.
playmat.gametip.mustfliptoplaytrainer.he: Must Flip to Play Trainer Card
playmat.gametip.paralyzed.body: While Paralyzed, a Pokémon cannot attack or retreat. At the end of your turn, your Pokémon returns to normal.
playmat.gametip.poisoned.body: When a Pokémon is Poisoned, put 1 damage counter on it between turns.
playmat.gametip.pokebody.body: A Poké-Body is an ability of a Pokémon that is active as long as that Pokémon is in play.
playmat.gametip.prizecardawarded.body: Every time you Knock Out an opponent's Pokémon, you take a Prize card.
playmat.gametip.retreat.body: Retreating switches your Active Pokémon with one of your Benched Pokémon. To retreat, you must discard Energy from the retreating Pokémon equal to its Retreat Cost.

product.avatarcharizardpack.description: Introducing the sizzling Charizard-Themed Avatar Collection Box! Each box contains 3 avatar items from this impressive 35-item collection. Completed collections feature a total of 6 outfits plus an assortment of avatar accessories designed in the theme of the fearsome Charizard. Items vary by box. Items are tradable.
product.avatarcharizardpack.name: Charizard-Themed Avatar Collection Box
product.avatarpikachupack.description: Introducing the electrifying Pikachu-Themed Avatar Collection! Each box contains 3 avatar items from this awesome 35-item collection. Completed collections feature a total of 6 outfits plus an assortment of avatar accessories designed in the theme of Pikachu. Items vary by box. Items are tradable.
product.avatarpikachupack.name: Pikachu-Themed Avatar Collection Box
product.bw1.booster.description: Exciting New Discoveries, Powerful New Pokémon… More Epic Battles! \nA new generation of Pokémon has arrived! The Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White expansion brings you a legion of over 70 new Pokémon from the newly explored Unova region, including the Legendary Reshiram and Zekrom, both featuring never-before-seen art that covers the ENTIRE card! The Pokémon TCG: Black & White expansion is your gateway to a bigger Pokémon world!
product.bw1.booster.retro.shop-disclaime: These cards are legal for Expanded and Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 2/21/2018
product.bw1.pcd.blueassault.name: Blue Assault
product.bw1.pcd.greentornado.name: Green Tornado
product.bw1.pcd.redfrenzy.name: Red Frenzy
product.bw1.pcd.retro.shop-disclaimer: This deck is legal for Theme format tournaments and competition. These cards are legal for Expanded and Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 2/14/2018
product.bw10.booster.description: Challenges ring out, Pokémon duel, and the battle for Unova enters the next chapter in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Blast expansion! With Virizion-EX by your side, you must lead the counterattack against the failing forces of Team Plasma as they mount their last stand behind the twinned might of Team Plasma Dialga-EX and Palkia-EX! Victory is within your grasp, when suddenly you face your greatest test…the mighty and mysterious Genesect-EX takes the battlefield, supported by devastating ACE SPEC cards that give it additional attacks! Trainers, it's time to break the ice!
product.bw10.booster.retro.description: Challenges ring out, Pokémon duel, and the battle for Unova enters the next chapter in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Blast expansion! With Virizion-EX by your side, you must lead the counterattack against the failing forces of Team Plasma as they mount their last stand behind the twinned might of Team Plasma Dialga-EX and Palkia-EX! Victory is within your grasp, when suddenly you face your greatest test…the mighty and mysterious Genesect-EX takes the battlefield, supported by devastating ACE SPEC cards that give it additional attacks! Trainers, it's time to break the ice!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
product.bw10.pcd.mindwipe.name: Mind Wipe
product.bw10.pcd.solarstrike.name: Solar Strike
product.bw11.booster.description: Legends lost are recovered, buried treasures are found, and in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Legendary Treasures expansion, Pokémon as you've never seen them will dazzle you! Discover new Pokémon-EX, as well as the return of mighty champions. Find new Trainer cards to revolutionize your battle strategy! Command your forces and drive onward to victory! Locate the scattered jewels of the Radiant Collection! And, above all, hunt for the golden glimmers that signify an amazing find…
product.bw11.booster.retro.description: Legends lost are recovered, buried treasures are found, and in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Legendary Treasures expansion, Pokémon as you've never seen them will dazzle you! Discover new Pokémon-EX, as well as the return of mighty champions. Find new Trainer cards to revolutionize your battle strategy! Command your forces and drive onward to victory! Locate the scattered jewels of the Radiant Collection! And, above all, hunt for the golden glimmers that signify an amazing find…\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
product.bw2.booster.description: Forces Unveiled, Strengths Revealed… Powers Emerged! \nThe secrets of the Unova region are now yours to command! In the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Emerging Powers expansion, astonishing new Pokémon are available for the very first time, including the rare and powerful Legendary Pokémon Cobalion, Terrakion, Virizion, Thundurus, and Tornadus! With brand-new Item cards to revitalize your deck, the Black & White—Emerging Powers expansion offers Trainers all of the amazing new strategies of Unova!
product.bw2.booster.retro.shop-disclaime: These cards are legal for Expanded and Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 2/28/2018
product.bw2.pcd.powerplay.name: Power Play
product.bw2.pcd.retro.shop-disclaimer: This deck is legal for Theme format tournaments and competition. These cards are legal for Expanded and Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 2/21/2018
product.bw2.pcd.toxictricks.name: Toxic Tricks
product.bw3.booster.description: New Legends for a Noble Victory! \nThe Black & White—Noble Victories expansion crowns you a noble among players! Choose from more than 90 amazing new Pokémon, including the Victory Pokémon Victini, plus new Fossil and Legendary Pokémon. Noble Victories helps you battle in style with new powers, new strategies, and new ways to conquer your opponents. So, seize the spoils—rally your Pokémon and get ready to battle your way to victory!
product.bw3.booster.retro.description: New Legends for a Noble Victory! The Black & White—Noble Victories expansion crowns you a noble among players! Choose from more than 90 amazing new Pokémon, including the Victory Pokémon Victini, plus new Fossil and Legendary Pokémon. Noble Victories helps you battle in style with new powers, new strategies, and new ways to conquer your opponents. So, seize the spoils—rally your Pokémon and get ready to battle your way to victory! Available for a limited time!

product.bw4.booster.description: Expect a Battle-Filled Destiny with Pokémon-EX! \nThe Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White—Next Destinies expansion is loaded with powerful Pokémon-EX to give you extraordinary excitement! Discover great Pokémon like Reshiram-EX and Zekrom-EX, and even Pokémon from beyond the Unova region, like Mewtwo-EX. Next Destinies delivers your destiny: Pokémon with exceptional HP, Special Energy and Trainer cards with expanded powers, and expert strategies to extend your victory streaks!
product.bw4.pcd.explosiveedge.name: Explosive Edge
product.bw4.pcd.voltagevortex.name: Voltage Vortex
product.bw5.booster.description: Brace Yourself to Explore the Darkness… \nWhat's out there in the darkness, waiting to be discovered? Play the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White—Dark Explorers expansion and find them all! In addition to more Pokémon-EX like Tornadus-EX, Raikou-EX, and Groudon-EX, the shadows are filled with other exceptional surprises, like Darkrai-EX and a host of Trainer cards that will knock your opponent's lights out! When you play Black & White—Dark Explorers, you'll not only explore the darkness, you'll rule it!
product.bw5.booster.retro.description: What's out there in the darkness, waiting to be discovered? Play the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White—Dark Explorers expansion and find them all! In addition to more Pokémon-EX like Tornadus-EX, Raikou-EX, and Groudon-EX, the shadows are filled with other exceptional surprises, like Darkrai-EX and a host of Trainer cards that will knock your opponent's lights out! When you play Black & White—Dark Explorers, you'll not only explore the darkness, you'll rule it!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!

product.bw6.booster.description: The might of dragons is yours to control in a way that can change your game forever—as a brand-new Energy type! Rayquaza. Giratina. Hydreigon. Few Pokémon inspire awe and wonder like Dragon-type Pokémon, and in the Dragons Exalted expansion, they come ready to rule the game! And with a grand mix of all-new Pokémon-EX and a horde of Dragon-type Pokémon to take to the skies and take the battlefield by storm, plus new Trainer cards and new Special Energy cards, you'll be ready for the roar of dragons and the glory of battle!
product.bw6.booster.retro.description: The might of dragons is yours to control in a way that can change your game forever—as a brand-new Energy type! Rayquaza. Giratina. Hydreigon. Few Pokémon inspire awe and wonder like Dragon-type Pokémon, and in the Dragons Exalted expansion, they come ready to rule the game! And with a grand mix of all-new Pokémon-EX and a horde of Dragon-type Pokémon to take to the skies and take the battlefield by storm, plus new Trainer cards and new Special Energy cards, you'll be ready for the roar of dragons and the glory of battle!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!

product.bw6.pcd.dragonspeed.name: DragonSpeed
product.bw7.booster.description: Step into the next dimension of your journey into battle using the might of the Boundary Pokémon…both White Kyurem and Black Kyurem! Harness the powers of more Pokémon-EX like Landorus, Cresselia, and Celebi, and Keldeo makes its debut in the Black & White—Boundaries Crossed expansion as both a Pokémon and a Pokémon-EX, along with the never-before-seen, powerful ACE SPEC Trainer cards, which are so devastating that you can only carry one into battle! Cross over to sweep aside your opponents with one mighty push!
product.bw7.booster.retro.description: Step into the next dimension of your journey into battle using the might of the Boundary Pokémon…both White Kyurem and Black Kyurem! Harness the powers of more Pokémon-EX like Landorus, Cresselia, and Celebi, and Keldeo makes its debut in the Black & White—Boundaries Crossed expansion as both a Pokémon and a Pokémon-EX, along with the never-before-seen, powerful ACE SPEC Trainer cards, which are so devastating that you can only carry one into battle! Cross over to sweep aside your opponents with one mighty push!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
product.bw8.booster.description: Clouds gather, Energy crackles, and when you play the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Storm expansion, a new force will be felt as the tempestuous Team Plasma makes its debut! All must make ready for a new battlefield, featuring electrifying Team Plasma Pokémon, game-changing Trainer cards, and Team Plasma Pokémon-EX such as Articuno-EX, Zapdos-EX, and Lugia-EX. And, as all-new, powerful ACE SPEC cards blast the balance of power and even more amazing Pokémon-EX race into battle, a question must be asked: Trainers, are you ready? Prepare for the Plasma Storm!

Prepare for the Plasma Storm!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!

product.bw9.booster.description: Team Plasma's frosty assault on Unova continues in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Freeze expansion, and Trainers everywhere must show an icy resolve if they are to halt the relentless deep freeze! The struggle will be bitter as Team Plasma releases a blizzard of Team Plasma Pokémon, including Deoxys-EX, Thundurus-EX, and all of Eevee's Evolutions, backed by Team Plasma Energy, Item, and Supporter cards. But, with the Legendary Eon Pokémon Latios and Latias standing by your side and a host of Pokémon-EX ready to do battle, your opponents will find that now is the winter of their discontent!
product.bw9.booster.retro.description: Team Plasma's frosty assault on Unova continues in the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Plasma Freeze expansion, and Trainers everywhere must show an icy resolve if they are to halt the relentless deep freeze! The struggle will be bitter as Team Plasma releases a blizzard of Team Plasma Pokémon, including Deoxys-EX, Thundurus-EX, and all of Eevee's Evolutions, backed by Team Plasma Energy, Item, and Supporter cards. But, with the Legendary Eon Pokémon Latios and Latias standing by your side and a host of Pokémon-EX ready to do battle, your opponents will find that now is the winter of their discontent!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!

product.dm.booster.11card.name: Dragon Majesty
product.dm.booster.6card.name: Dragon Majesty
product.dm.booster.generic.sell-text: Noble Pokémon of wing and claw, flying high above the changing world! The Pokémon TCG: Dragon Majesty expansion brings a mighty horde of draconic Pokémon: Reshiram-GX, Salamence-GX, Dragonite-GX, and over a dozen more, including Charizard! Their command of fire, battle, and sky puts Dragon types at the top of many Trainers’ lists—get to know these amazing and challenging Pokémon in the Dragon Majesty expansion!
product.dv.booster.description: The vault echoes with the roar of Dragons—can you train what you find within? Inside the Pokémon TCG: Dragon Vault, you'll discover a treasure trove you've never seen before! You'll find incredible Dragon Pokémon such as Rayquaza and Druddigon—ALL of them foil!—in special 5-card booster packs, plus a code card to unlock hoards of rewards for the Pokémon TCG Online. So, when you open the vault, be prepared to command the might of these powerful Dragon Pokémon!

product.hf.booster.11card.name: Hidden Fates
product.hf.booster.6card.name: Hidden Fates
product.hf.booster.generic.sell-text: A wild set loaded with all-time favorites, the Pokémon TCG: Hidden Fates expansion is a collector’s dream and a player’s paradise! Soar to new heights with the first TAG TEAM trio, Moltres & Zapdos & Articuno-GX, as well as Gyarados-GX and more than 75 Pokémon in their Shiny forms—including Mewtwo-GX and Charizard-GX! Reach out for the unusual, astonishing power of Pokémon, and discover your own Hidden Fates!
product.hgss1.booster.description: Journey to the Johto Region to Reveal HeartGold & SoulSilver! \nPokémon are the heart and soul of any great Pokémon Trainer, and now is your chance to catch some of the greatest Pokémon of all time! With new kinds of cards that will change the way you play—like Pokémon Prime and the astonishing Pokémon LEGENDs Ho-Oh and Lugia—plus lots of Trainer cards that will accelerate your game and select Energy cards with a brand-new look, the HeartGold & SoulSilver expansion will get you started on your journey to greatness!
product.hgss1.booster.retro.shop-disclai: These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/17/2018
product.hgss1.pcd.emberspark.name: Ember Spark
product.hgss1.pcd.growthclash.name: Growth Clash
product.hgss1.pcd.mindflood.name: Mind Flood
product.hgss1.pcd.retro.shop-disclaimer: This deck is legal for Theme format tournaments and competition. These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/10/2018
product.hgss2.booster.description: Pokémon LEGENDs Freed...Pokémon Prime Released...HS—Unleashed! \nRaikou... Entei... Suicune... Alone, each of these Legendary Pokémon is a force to be reckoned with, but let loose in pairs, they become amazing LEGEND cards! In the HS—Unleashed expansion, you'll find Pokémon Prime bursting at the seams, powerful Pokémon like Jirachi and Shaymin raring to join the battle, and Pokémon LEGENDs joining forces for twice the excitement! Are you a powerful enough Trainer to command what's been Unleashed?
product.hgss2.booster.retro.shop-disclai: These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/24/2018
product.hgss2.pcd.chaoscontrol.descripti: The chaotic powers that have been unleashed can only be controlled by an amazing Pokémon Trainer. Is it you? In the Chaos Control theme deck, you'll need to balance devastating attacks like Tyranitar's Tail Crush and Lucario's Bulk Up against more strategic approaches like Mismagius's Psychic Pulse. With all of your opponent's Pokémon vulnerable to your battle plans, can you control your forces until victory is yours?
product.hgss2.pcd.chaoscontrol.name: Chaos Control
product.hgss2.pcd.retro.shop-disclaimer: This deck is legal for Theme format tournaments and competition. These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/17/2018
product.hgss2.pcd.steelsentinel.name: Steel Sentinel
product.hgss3.booster.description: No Challenge Too Great, No Battle Too Fierce: HS—Undaunted!\nThe greatest Trainers are those who are fearless in the face of battle. And that's you! In the Pokémon TCG: HS—Undaunted expansion, you'll discover battle-ready Pokémon just waiting to be summoned by the fearless Trainer in you! The powerful Rayquaza and Deoxys become a Pokémon LEGEND to be reckoned with...six Pokémon—from Raichu to Umbreon to Slowking—join the ranks of Pokémon Prime...and Stadium cards like the Ruins of Alph and Trainer cards like Legend Box change every player's strategy. Are you ready to be Undaunted?
product.hgss3.booster.retro.shop-disclai: These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/31/2018.
product.hgss3.pcd.daybreak.name: Daybreak
product.hgss3.pcd.nightfall.name: Nightfall
product.hgss3.pcd.retro.shop-disclaimer: This deck is legal for Theme format tournaments and competition. These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/24/2018
product.hgss4.booster.description: The Goal of Every Battle, the Pride of Every Trainer… \nBattle for the excitement, for the challenge…and for the victory! In the Pokémon Trading Card Game: HS—Triumphant expansion, you'll find what you need to put triumph within your reach. Palkia and Dialga combine as an incredible Pokémon LEGEND. Machamp, Gengar, and a half-dozen other powerful Pokémon appear for the first time as Pokémon Prime. New Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards—plus a new Special Energy card—give you new strategies and deck ideas. The only thing missing is a Trainer who battles to win…and that's you!
product.hgss4.booster.retro.shop-disclai: These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 2/7/2018
Pokémon are the heart and soul of any great Pokémon Trainer, and now is your chance to catch some of the greatest Pokémon of all time! All cards are legal in the Legacy format and cannot be played in Standard or Expanded matches. Bundle Contents: • 1 HS—Triumphant Royal Guard theme deck • 1 HeartGold & SoulSilver Series Machamp Prime card (#95/102) that fits perfectly with this deck's strategy! • 1 complete Evolution chain with three Pokémon cards for your deck: Nidoran (#70/102), Nidorino (#46/102), and Nidoking (#6/102) • 3 Pokémon TCG: HS—Triumphant booster packs This offer runs through April 12, 2016.
product.hgss4.pcd.retro.shop-disclaimer: This deck is legal for Theme format tournaments and competition. These cards are legal for Legacy format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/31/2018
product.hgss4.pcd.royalguard.name: Royal Guard
product.hgss4.pcd.verdantfrost.name: Verdant Frost
product.hgss5.booster.description: Joining of Powers, Battle of Forces, Call of Legends \nTheir names are legend: Raikou. Entei. Suicune. Lugia. Ho-Oh. Kyogre. Groudon. Rayquaza. Deoxys. Dialga. Palkia. And when Legendary Pokémon come together, only the greatest Trainers can control their might. In the Pokémon TCG: Call of Legends expansion, not only will you discover incredibly powerful Pokémon—including very rare "Shiny" versions of some of them—but you'll also find exciting new Lost Zone effects to expand your gameplay choices. The Legendary Pokémon have gathered—are you ready to answer the call?

product.sm.battledeck.rayquazagx.name: Battle Arena Deck: Rayquaza-GX
product.sm.battledeck.rayquazagx.sell-te: Swift as lightning and loaded with power! You’ll always be ready with the recharge for Rayquaza-GX, Tapu Koko {*}, and Zapdos in this Lightning- and Grass-type deck.
product.sm.battledeck.ultranecrozmagx.se: A nightmare for your opponent! Strike hard with Ultra Necrozma-GX, Giratina, and Malamar in this Metal- and Psychic-type deck.
product.sm.f18tin.glaceongx.name: Snowy Gaze Deck
product.sm.f18tin.glaceongx.sell-text: Control the chilly blast of Glaceon-GX and its friends Kingdra and Alolan Ninetales, together with strong Supporters including Cynthia and Guzma. This Water-type deck is ready to freeze out those opposing Pokémon!
product.sm.f18tin.leafeongx.name: Green Wonder Deck
product.sm.f18tin.leafeongx.sell-text: With Leafeon-GX leading the way, this Grass-type deck calls Alolan Exeggutor, Venusaur, and even Oranguru into the arena, plus great Trainer cards including Gardenia and Ultra Ball!
product.sm.f18tin.sylveongx.name: Fairy Power Deck
product.sm.f18tin.sylveongx.sell-text: Sylveon-GX winds and wraps those mystic ribbons into Fairy-type tricks, with help from Florges, Guzma, Cynthia—and four Missing Clovers! That fun mix of luck and skill makes this deck shine!
product.sm.f19tin.charizardgx.name: Charizard-GX Deck
product.sm.f19tin.charizardgx.sell-text: Refuel that fire! Keep recycling Energy to power up massive attacks with Charizard-GX, Arcanine, and Salazzle in this Fire-type deck.
product.sm.f19tin.garchompgiratinagx.sel: Ghostly tricks and draconic determination! Damage your opponent’s Bench while protecting your own with Garchomp & Giratina-GX, Gengar, and Mew in this Psychic- and Fighting-type deck.
product.sm.f19tin.gyaradosgx.name: Gyarados-GX Deck
product.sm.f19tin.gyaradosgx.sell-text: A storm surge of destruction! Use the waves to your advantage and move Energy around where you need it with Gyarados-GX, Articuno, and Naganadel in this Water-type deck.
product.sm.f19tin.lucariomelmetalgx.name: Lucario & Melmetal-GX Deck
product.sm.f19tin.lucariomelmetalgx.sell: Put the pedal to the metal! Build up an impenetrable wall and keep it fortified with Lucario & Melmetal-GX, Magnezone, and Pidgeotto in this Metal-type deck.
product.sm.f19tin.mewtwomewgx.name: Mewtwo & Mew-GX Deck
product.sm.f19tin.mewtwomewgx.sell-text: Two minds are better than one! Do massive damage and keep your own team in fighting shape with Mewtwo & Mew-GX, Malamar, and Blissey in this Psychic-type deck.
product.sm.f19tin.raichugx.name: Raichu-GX Deck
product.sm.f19tin.raichugx.sell-text: Maximum voltage incoming! Keep the electricity flowing to your Pokémon with Raichu-GX, Magnezone, and Zebstrika in this Lightning-type deck.
product.sm.pcd.letsplayeevee.name: Let’s Play, Eevee!
product.sm.pcd.letsplayeevee.sell-text: Join forces with Eevee and friends to play the Pokémon Trading Card Game! This ready-to-play deck includes everything you need to pick up the basics of the game, from the very first card you draw to the last Prize card you take! Evolve Eevee into Flareon to boost your team’s power, and fill up your Bench with fiery Pokémon like Charizard, Moltres, and more. A variety of useful Trainer cards helps round out your strategy.
product.sm.pcd.letsplaypikachu.name: Let’s Play, Pikachu!
product.sm.pcd.letsplaypikachu.sell-text: Join forces with Pikachu and friends to play the Pokémon Trading Card Game! This ready-to-play deck includes everything you need to pick up the basics of the game, from the very first card you draw to the last Prize card you take! Evolve Pikachu into Alolan Raichu to boost your team’s power, and fill up your Bench with electrifying Pokémon like Raikou, Zebstrika, and more. A variety of useful Trainer cards helps round out your strategy.
product.sm.sp19tin.celebivenusaurgx.name: Celebi & Venusaur-GX Deck
product.sm.sp19tin.celebivenusaurgx.sell: With Celebi & Venusaur-GX leading the way, this Grass-type deck brings Venusaur, Sceptile, and even Shuckle into the arena, plus great Trainer cards including Guzma, Lillie, Ultra Ball, and Ingo & Emmet!
product.sm.sp19tin.eeveesnorlaxgx.name: Eevee & Snorlax-GX Deck
product.sm.sp19tin.eeveesnorlaxgx.sell-t: Come have fun with Eevee & Snorlax-GX surfing a Water-type wave, with help from Blastoise, Lapras, Brock’s Grit, Erika’s Hospitality—and two Double Colorless Energy! Their combination of freewheeling and hard-hitting makes this deck shine!
product.sm.sp19tin.flareongx.name: Flareon-GX Deck
product.sm.sp19tin.flareongx.sell-text: With Flareon-GX and Blaziken firing up the attack, this Fire-type deck brings Moltres, Oranguru, and Magcargo into the ring of lava, plus great Trainer cards including Guzma, Kiawe, Ultra Ball, and Rescue Stretcher!
product.sm.sp19tin.jolteongx.name: Jolteon-GX Deck
product.sm.sp19tin.jolteongx.sell-text: Throw up some major static with Jolteon-GX, Zebstrika, and Electivire, and boost their voltage with Electropower, Field Blower, and Volkner! Combine a zillion zaps and buzzes to leave your opponent in a state of shock with this Lightning-type deck!
product.sm.sp19tin.pikachuzekromgx.name: Pikachu & Zekrom-GX Deck
product.sm.sp19tin.pikachuzekromgx.sell-: Blast the lightning of Pikachu & Zekrom-GX and their friends from Magnezone to Kangaskhan, together with strong Trainer cards from Lillie to Guzma. This Lightning-type deck can call down the thunder on those opposing Pokémon!
product.sm.sp19tin.vaporeongx.name: Vaporeon-GX Deck
product.sm.sp19tin.vaporeongx.sell-text: Freeze and frost those foes with Vaporeon-GX and its friends Alolan Ninetales, Quagsire, and Naganadel, together with strong Trainer cards such as Guzma, Judge, and Lillie. This Water-type deck is ready to roll in the tide!
product.sm1.booster.description: Welcome to the tropical Alola region! Start your journey with Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio, then seek out the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo-GX and Lunala-GX to witness the awesome power of a new kind of Pokémon: each Pokémon-GX brings an attack so devastating that you can use only one of them per game! Discover dozens of never-before-seen Pokémon, Alola forms of some familiar favorites, and new ways to battle in the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon expansion!
product.sm1.prereleasepack.description: A 23-card Evolution pack from Sun & Moon, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm1.prereleasepack.name: Sun & Moon Evolution Pack
product.sm10.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds
product.sm10.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds
product.sm10.booster.generic.sell-text: When you have a partner you can count on, nothing can stop you! With trust and practice, these Pokémon can tackle just about anything, so check out the amazing Pokémon pairings in the Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds expansion!
product.sm10.buildandbattlebox.evolution: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Unbroken Bonds Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm10.pcd.battlemind.name: Battle Mind
product.sm10.pcd.battlemind.sell-text: Combine raw heat and psychic prowess for an attack that’s hard to stop! Mewtwo’s Mind Report Ability recovers the awesome Welder Supporter card, so you can keep your Fire-type Pokémon totally fired up. Incineroar adds fuel to the fire in the Battle Mind theme deck!
product.sm10.pcd.lightningloop.name: Lightning Loop
product.sm10.pcd.lightningloop.sell-text: The Mythical Pokémon Zeraora leads the charge in this looping electrical wonder! This deck recycles Lightning Energy with Magnezone, so you always have plenty to fuel Zeraora’s powerful Discharge attack. Dodrio and Raticate step in as quick attackers in the Lightning Loop theme deck!
product.sm11.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Unified Minds
product.sm11.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Unified Minds
product.sm11.booster.generic.sell-text: To stay on top, your team must work as one! True teammates take aim at a single goal—find your perfect partners and battle in flawless harmony with the Sun & Moon—Unified Minds expansion!
product.sm11.buildandbattlebox.evolution: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Unified Minds Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm11.pcd.laserfocus.name: Laser Focus
product.sm11.pcd.laserfocus.sell-text: Help Necrozma get that laser dialed in perfectly! This deck recycles Energy with Malamar’s Psychic Recharge—so you always have enough power to push the attack. Audino and Silvally provide support as you zero in on the competition with the Laser Focus theme deck!
product.sm11.pcd.soaringstorm.name: Soaring Storm
product.sm11.pcd.soaringstorm.sell-text: Pull lightning and torrential rain out of the air for Dragon Impact, and rebuild your power with Dragonite’s Hurricane Charge Ability! Thundurus and Tornadus join the fray to keep foes reeling as you hold the high ground with the Soaring Storm theme deck!
product.sm12.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Cosmic Eclipse
product.sm12.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Cosmic Eclipse
product.sm12.booster.generic.sell-text: The Sun & Moon—Cosmic Eclipse expansion boosts the connection of Pokémon and Trainers, and it launches TAG TEAM combinations to new levels! Feel the stellar power of Pokémon with the Sun & Moon—Cosmic Eclipse expansion!
product.sm12.booster.generic.tagline: A Supreme Connection of Stars and Pokémon!
product.sm12.buildandbattlebox.evolution: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Cosmic Eclipse Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm12.pcd.toweringheights.name: Towering Heights
product.sm12.pcd.toweringheights.sell-te: The Legendary Groudon is ready to smash foes, with Garchomp at its side! Use Seismitoad’s Bulldoze Ability for power searches, and call on Lady for extra Energy and Throh for big attacks. Strike from above with the Towering Heights theme deck!
product.sm12.pcd.unseendepths.name: Unseen Depths
product.sm12.pcd.unseendepths.sell-text: Call the swirling waves with Kyogre, a Legendary Pokémon of the ocean. Use Empoleon’s powerful Recall to strike from the sea, and spin opponents around with Phione’s Whirlpool Suction. Command the surf and roll on to victory with the Unseen Depths theme deck!
product.sm12.pcd.unseendepths.tagline: Dive Deep and Strike from Below!
product.sm2.prereleasepack.description: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm2.prereleasepack.name: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Evolution Pack
product.sm3.prereleasepack.description: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Burning Shadows Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm3.prereleasepack.name: Sun & Moon—Burning Shadows Evolution Pack
product.sm4.prereleasepack.description: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Crimson Invasion Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm4.prereleasepack.name: Sun & Moon—Crimson Invasion Evolution Pack
product.sm6.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Forbidden Light
product.sm6.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Forbidden Light
product.sm6.booster.generic.sell-text: Taking the Pokémon world by surprise, Necrozma has absorbed a Legendary Pokémon and taken on a new form as Ultra Necrozma-GX! Other Pokémon gather to welcome this new light…or to resist it. Lucario-GX, Greninja-GX, Zygarde-GX, Yveltal-GX, Naganadel-GX, even Volcanion {*} and the majestic Arceus {*} must choose a side. Discover awesome Pokémon and mysterious treasures in the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Forbidden Light expansion!
product.sm6.buildandbattlebox.evolutionp: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Forbidden Light Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm6.pcd.tropicaltakedown.name: Tropical Takedown
product.sm6.pcd.tropicaltakedown.sell-te: Alolan Exeggutor leads the way with its Tropical Shake attack, and lots of Alolan Pokémon come along to win as a team! This deck helps you make the most of your big attacks—go shake it up with the Tropical Takedown theme deck!
product.sm6.pcd.twilightrogue.name: Twilight Rogue
product.sm6.pcd.twilightrogue.sell-text: Outnumbered? No problem! Lycanroc does more damage when your opponent's Bench is full, so use Dusknoir to force your opponent to play more Basic Pokémon. Salazzle and Malamar pull more cards and more Energy—for more ways to win with the Twilight Rogue theme deck!
product.sm7.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Celestial Storm
product.sm7.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Celestial Storm
product.sm7.booster.generic.sell-text: Watch out for the vortex! It’s a season of furious emerald storms and a sky alive with portents, as Pokémon and creatures from Ultra Space clash. Some ride the storm, and others defy it, with a lineup including Articuno-GX, Blaziken-GX, Scizor-GX, Stakataka-GX, and the amazing Rayquaza-GX, plus new {*} cards featuring Latios, Latias, and Jirachi. Face the winds of change head-on in the Sun & Moon—Celestial Storm expansion!
product.sm7.buildandbattlebox.evolutionp: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Celestial Storm Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm7.pcd.hydrofury.name: Hydro Fury
product.sm7.pcd.hydrofury.sell-text: Swampert’s Hydro Pump can pack a wallop—just pump up the power and let it rip! Throw everything you’ve got into the battle with the full rage of the Hydro Fury theme deck!
product.sm7.pcd.leafcharge.name: Leaf Charge
product.sm7.pcd.leafcharge.sell-text: Call on the strength and agility of Sceptile! Gather a growing storm of Grass and Lightning power, and then unleash a furious attack. Stay charged up with the Leaf Charge theme deck!
product.sm8.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Lost Thunder
product.sm8.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Lost Thunder
product.sm8.booster.generic.sell-text: Travel to the forested hills, where the fragrance of incense from ancient shrines and the sparks of high-voltage Pokémon fill the air! The Sun & Moon—Lost Thunder expansion fuses the new with the traditional, featuring Celebi {*} and Ditto {*}, plus Blacephalon-GX, Lugia-GX, Tyranitar-GX, and the newest Mythical Pokémon, Zeraora-GX! Call down the big thunder and charge up your deck with the high-powered Pokémon in the Sun & Moon—Lost Thunder expansion!
product.sm8.booster.generic.tagline: Ancient Power Echoing from the Mountaintops!
product.sm8.buildandbattlebox.evolutionp: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Lost Thunder Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm8.pcd.blazingvolcano.name: Blazing Volcano
product.sm8.pcd.blazingvolcano.sell-text: Release the red-hot power of the Legendary Pokémon Entei! This slow-building deck combines the power of Fire and Grass types to fan a small flame into a raging inferno. Burn your way to victory with the Blazing Volcano theme deck!
product.sm8.pcd.blazingvolcano.tagline: From Small Sparks to a Raging Volcano!
product.sm8.pcd.stormcaller.name: Storm Caller
product.sm8.pcd.stormcaller.sell-text: Ride the wind with the surging power of the Legendary Pokémon Raikou! This high-voltage deck has the support to charge up potent hits—and runs some risks for the big Knock Out. Master the lightning with the Storm Caller theme deck!
product.sm9.booster.11card.name: Sun & Moon—Team Up
product.sm9.booster.6card.name: Sun & Moon—Team Up
product.sm9.booster.generic.sell-text: TAG TEAM Pokémon-GX are here, brand-new cards that feature paired-up and powered-up Pokémon! The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Team Up expansion offers amazing battle teams like Pikachu & Zekrom-GX, Eevee & Snorlax-GX, and Gengar & Mimikyu-GX, plus even more Pokémon-GX: Lycanroc-GX, Hoopa-GX, Cobalion-GX, and others! When the teams put their moves into motion, it’s a total free-for-all. Check out the awesome action and dynamic duos in the Sun & Moon—Team Up expansion!
product.sm9.buildandbattlebox.evolutionp: A 23-card Sun & Moon—Team Up Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.sm9.pcd.relentlessflame.name: Relentless Flame
product.sm9.pcd.relentlessflame.sell-tex: Fire it up with the relentless flames of Charizard! This deck burns super hot, so keep feeding Charizard enough Fire Energy to create an unstoppable Continuous Blaze Ball. Burn bright and burn true with the Relentless Flame theme deck!
product.sm9.pcd.torrentialcannon.name: Torrential Cannon
product.sm9.pcd.torrentialcannon.sell-te: Give your opponent a high-pressure soaking with help from Blastoise! Use Golduck’s Amnesia to keep the other side off-balance as you power up a devastating Hydro Tackle attack. Wash away the competition with the Torrential Cannon theme deck!
product.sm9.pcd.torrentialcannon.tagline: Let It Rain, Let It Pour!
product.spinnermysterybox.name: Mystery Box
product.swsh1.booster.11card.name: Sword & Shield
product.swsh1.booster.6card.name: Sword & Shield
product.swsh1.booster.generic.sell-text: Welcome to the Galar region! Meet more than a dozen powerful new Pokémon V, including the Legendary Zacian and Zamazenta—and some, like Stonjourner and Snorlax, that can evolve into enormous Pokémon VMAX for even more power! You’ll also find first partners Grookey, Scorbunny, and Sobble, little cuties like Wooloo and Yamper, and a handful of familiar Pokémon in their new Galarian forms. Catch up with a new generation in the Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield expansion!
product.swsh1.booster.generic.tagline: Start a New Journey & Meet New Pokémon V!
product.swsh1.buildandbattlebox.evolutio: A 23-card Sword & Shield Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.swsh1.pcd.cinderace.name: Cinderace Theme Deck
product.swsh1.pcd.cinderace.sell-text: Eager for victory, Cinderace rallies the quick-burning power of Fire types! Its Flame Cloak attack brings Energy back into the game, Supporter Hop can score extra cards, and Dubwool’s Double-Edge delivers big whomping damage to keep the Cinderace theme deck burning extra hot!
product.swsh1.pcd.inteleon.name: Inteleon Theme Deck
product.swsh1.pcd.inteleon.sell-text: Sneaky Inteleon has a bag of tricks to trip up opponents! Use its Hydro Snipe attack to remove Energy from opposing Pokémon, and keep the foe from retreating with Drednaw’s Jaw Lock. Dodge madly and roll smoothly to victory with the Inteleon theme deck!
product.swsh1.pcd.rillaboom.name: Rillaboom Theme Deck
product.swsh1.pcd.rillaboom.sell-text: Leaping into battle, Rillaboom gets charged up with the fast-growing power of Grass types! Pound down the opposition with its Drum Roll attack, review your Professor’s Research to find new cards, and call on Eldegoss’s Blessing of Fluff for more Energy in the Rillaboom theme deck!
product.swsh1.pcd.rillaboom.tagline: Strong Growth—with the Power of Rillaboom!
product.swsh2.booster.11card.name: Sword & Shield—Rebel Clash
product.swsh2.booster.6card.name: Sword & Shield—Rebel Clash
product.swsh2.booster.generic.sell-text: Rock out with new Pokémon! Crank it loud and blast the beat—you’ll find rebellion, chaos, and punk attitude galore in the Pokémon TCG: Sword & Shield—Rebel Clash expansion, loaded with Pokémon V including Toxtricity V, Dubwool V, Boltund V, Sandaconda V, and more! You’ll also find a handful of Pokémon VMAX, including the final Evolutions of all three first partners, plus Copperajah VMAX and Dragapult VMAX. Take to the stage and the streets with the Sword & Shield—Rebel Clash expansion!
product.swsh2.booster.generic.tagline: Galarian Pokémon Are Ready to Rock!
product.swsh2.buildandbattlebox.evolutio: A 23-card Sword & Shield—Rebel Clash Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.tatm.booster.description: Two teams of villains emerge from their hideouts to clash over the fate of the world in Pokémon TCG: Double Crisis! Inside special 7-card booster packs, you'll discover incredible Team Aqua and Team Magma Pokémon. Get ready for danger, get ready for trouble—get ready for Double Crisis!

product.tk6a.xytrainerkit.name: Mindbind
product.tk7a.xytrainerkit.name: Claw Barrage
product.tk7b.xytrainerkit.name: Claw Barrage
product.tk8a.xytrainerkit.name: Eon Strike
product.treasureboxpack.description: Uncommon Chests contain a random number of Trainer Tokens and 1 random card of uncommon (or higher) rarity from a recent Pokémon TCG expansion. Contents are automatically updated as new expansions are released.
product.treasureboxpack.name: Uncommon Chest
product.treasureboxpackholo.description: Rare Holo Chests contain a random number of Trainer Tokens and 1 random card of rare Holo (or higher) rarity from a recent Pokémon TCG expansion. Contents are automatically updated as new expansions are released.
product.treasureboxpackholo.name: Rare Holo Chest
product.twentiethann.booster.description: Celebrate 20 years of Pokémon with the Pokémon TCG: Generations expansion, covering every stage of a Trainer's journey, from the choice of a first partner Pokémon to the most Elite of Trainer battles. Featuring Pikachu, Snorlax, Ninetales-EX, and Jolteon-EX, plus Mega Charizard-EX, Mega Blastoise-EX, and Mega Venusaur-EX, the Generations expansion is a power to be reckoned with! Train On.
product.uncommonboxpack.name: Uncommon Chest
product.xy.battledeck.megablastoise.name: Battle Arena Deck: Mega Blastoise
product.xy.battledeck.megablastoise.sell: Mega Blastoise is ready to blast away all opposition! Led by an exceptional Mega Evolution Pokémon-EX, this 60-card deck contains powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer. Let the battle begin!
product.xy.battledeck.megacharizardx.nam: Battle Arena Deck: Mega Charizard X
product.xy.battledeck.megacharizardx.sel: Mega Charizard X is ready to heat up the battlefield! Led by an exceptional Mega Evolution Pokémon-EX, this 60-card deck contains powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer. Let the battle begin!
product.xy0.pcd.card12.name: Froakie Deck
product.xy0.pcd.card3.name: Chespin Deck
product.xy0.pcd.card8.name: Fennekin Deck
product.xy1.booster.description: Kalos has been revealed, yet so much still remains unseen! New Trainers, new tactics, and the awe-inspiring Xerneas and Yveltal await—as does something else. Something…different. Something to make even the mightiest of Pokémon-EX tremble! A new age begins in the Pokémon TCG with Mega Evolution!
product.xy1.pcd.destructionrush.name: Destruction Rush
product.xy1.pcd.resilientlife.name: Resilient Life
product.xy1.resilientlife.name: Resilient Life
product.xy1.retro.booster.description: Kalos has been revealed, yet so much still remains unseen! New Trainers, new tactics, and the awe-inspiring Xerneas and Yveltal await—as does something else. Something…different. Something to make even the mightiest of Pokémon-EX tremble! A new age begins in the Pokémon TCG with Mega Evolution!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
product.xy10.booster.description: Mega Alakazam-EX sees the future—and shapes it to unify two worlds! The Legendary Pokémon Zygarde arrives in many different Formes to bring order, together with Lugia BREAK, Mega Altaria-EX, and Umbreon-EX. Fates are sealed, and two Pokémon worlds join together in the Pokémon TCG: XY—Fates Collide expansion!
product.xy10.pcd.battleruler.name: Battle Ruler
product.xy10.pcd.skyguardian.name: Sky Guardian
product.xy10.prereleasepack.description: A 23-card XY—Fates Collide Prerelease pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.xy10.prereleasepack.name: XY—Fates Collide Evolution Pack
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.azelf.name: 3-Pack Bundle: Azelf
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.azelf.sell-tex: Get in on the latest Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs from the new XY—Steam Siege expansion, a special holographic promo card featuring Azelf, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! INCLUDES: 3 booster packs, 1 coin, and a foil promo card!
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.azelf.shop-dis: These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition. \n\nOffer Expires: 2/7/2018
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.rayquaza.name: 3-Pack Bundle: Rayquaza
product.xy11.3-pk.blister.rayquaza.sell-: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Rayquaza Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY141) 3 XY—Steam Siege booster packs (10-card) 1 Fennekin coin
product.xy11.booster.description: Long years of stability come to an end when Shiny Mega Gardevoir-EX lays siege to the mighty Gear Palace with a host of greedy forces. The Mythical Steam Pokémon Volcanion must wield the dual powers of fire and water to stop them! As the battle rages, Xerneas BREAK and Yveltal BREAK face off in the Pokémon TCG: XY—Steam Siege expansion!
product.xy11.checklane.blister.floette.s: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with an awesome booster pack, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Floette Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY139) 1 XY—Steam Siege booster pack (10-card) 1 Fennekin coin
product.xy11.checklane.blister.lucario.s: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with an awesome booster pack, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Lucario Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY140) 1 XY—Steam Siege booster pack (10-card) 1 Fennekin coin
These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 3/7/2018
product.xy11.pcd.gearsoffire.name: Gears of Fire
product.xy11.pcd.ringoflightning.name: Ring of Lightning
product.xy11.prereleasepack.description: A 23-card XY—Steam Siege Evolution pack, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.xy11.prereleasepack.name: XY—Steam Siege Evolution Pack
product.xy12.3-pk.blister.blackkyurem.se: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Black Kyurem Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY160) 3 XY—Evolutions booster packs (10-card) 1 Froakie coin
product.xy12.3-pk.blister.blackkyurem.sh: These cards are legal for Standard format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 2/21/2018
product.xy12.booster.description: All Trainers and Pokémon grow and evolve—and this expansion restores the very first Pokémon trading cards to glory! With the exhilarating power of Mega Venusaur-EX, Mega Charizard-EX, and Mega Blastoise-EX, plus some wild surprises like Dragonite-EX, Ninetales BREAK, Machamp BREAK, and Mega Slowbro-EX, the classic hard-battling Pokémon and old-school Trainers are reinvented for a new generation. Ask Professor Oak to get you started, and reach new heights with the Pokémon TCG: XY—Evolutions expansion!
product.xy12.pcd.mewtwomayhem.name: Mewtwo Mayhem
product.xy12.pcd.pikachupower.name: Pikachu Power
product.xy12.prereleasepack.description: A 23-card Evolution pack from XY—Evolutions, including 1 of 4 unique foil promo cards.
product.xy12.prereleasepack.name: XY—Evolutions Evolution Pack
product.xy12.seed.pack.name: XY—Evolutions Evolution Pack
product.xy2.booster.description: Blaze your way to glory and watch the sparks fly when you play Pokémon TCG: XY—Flashfire! Ignite the action with a firestorm of Fire types and watch your opponents' terrified double-take as the awesome Mega Charizard-EX makes its scorching debut in this breathtaking expansion! Your explosive adventures will continue as your foes flee the field with certain doom flashing before their eyes!
product.xy2.pcd.brilliantthunder.name: Brilliant Thunder
product.xy2.pcd.mystictyphoon.name: Mystic Typhoon
product.xy2.retro.booster.description: Blaze your way to glory and watch the sparks fly when you play Pokémon TCG: XY—Flashfire! Ignite the action with a firestorm of Fire types and watch your opponents' terrified double-take as the awesome Mega Charizard-EX makes its scorching debut in this breathtaking expansion! Your explosive adventures will continue as your foes flee the field with certain doom flashing before their eyes!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
product.xy3.booster.description: Become King of the Ring!\nTrainers, step in the ring and fire up your ferocity for the Pokémon TCG: XY—Furious Fists expansion! Brace yourselves for a grand tournament unlike any before with Mega Lucario-EX and Mega Heracross-EX! And, as the competition intensifies, a host of Pokémon appear for the first time in the Pokémon TCG—each one eager to prove itself as a master of battle! With a team backed by brand-new Trainer cards to power up your Fighting-type Pokémon, your opponents will be left wondering what hit them!
product.xy3.pcd.darkhammer.name: Dark Hammer
product.xy3.pcd.enchantedecho.name: Enchanted Echo
product.xy3.retro.booster.description: Trainers, step in the ring and fire up your ferocity for the Pokémon TCG: XY—Furious Fists expansion! Brace yourselves for a grand tournament unlike any before with Mega Lucario-EX and Mega Heracross-EX! And, as the competition intensifies, a host of Pokémon appear for the first time in the Pokémon TCG—each one eager to prove itself as a master of battle! With a team backed by brand-new Trainer cards to power up your Fighting-type Pokémon, your opponents will be left wondering what hit them!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
product.xy4.booster.description: Master Mysterious Powers!\nGather your courage and peer into the haunted void with the Pokémon TCG: XY—Phantom Forces expansion! Mega Manectric-EX makes a shocking appearance to light the way, while the ghostly grin of Mega Gengar-EX frightens challengers near and far. Take along Aegislash-EX to give you an edge, push the limits of Mega Evolution with new Spirit Link cards, and call on all of your Trainer knowledge to escape the eerie forces at work!
product.xy4.booster.retro.shop-disclaime: These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 12/20/2017
product.xy4.pcd.bolttwister.name: Bolt Twister
product.xy4.pcd.burningwinds.name: Burning Winds
product.xy5.booster.description: Ancient Rivals Awaken!\nAfter centuries asleep, the deep power of Primal Groudon-EX erupts from the land as Primal Kyogre-EX crashes in from the sea, riding titanic waves into battle! With colossal new arrivals like Mega Gardevoir-EX and Mega Aggron-EX, the Pokémon TCG: XY—Primal Clash expansion is alive with the primordial power of Ancient Traits—plus all-new Spirit Link and Special Energy cards! Let the earth shake and the oceans thunder, and get ready for a primal clash like no other!
product.xy5.booster.retro.shop-disclaime: These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 12/27/2017
product.xy5.pcd.earthspulse.name: Earth's Pulse
product.xy5.pcd.oceanscore.name: Ocean's Core
product.xy6.3-pk.blister.pangoro.name: 3-Pack Bundle: Pangoro
product.xy6.3-pk.blister.pangoro.sell-te: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Pangoro Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY50) 3 XY—Roaring Skies booster packs (10-card) 1 Chespin coin
product.xy6.3-pk.blister.pangoro.shop-di: These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. \n\nOffer Expires: 2/28/2018
product.xy6.3-pk.blister.regirock.name: 3-Pack Bundle: Regirock
product.xy6.3-pk.blister.regirock.sell-t: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, a special foil card, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! This bundle contains: 1 foil Regirock Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY49) 3 XY—Roaring Skies booster packs (10-card) 1 Chespin coin
product.xy6.3-pk.blister.regirock.shop-d: These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. \n\nOffer Expires: 3/14/2018
product.xy6.booster.description: Ride the Winds of Battle!\nDiving from the edge of space, Mega Rayquaza-EX makes its magnificent debut while Mega Latios-EX and a horde of Dragon types bellow their challenge! With high-flying superstars like Deoxys, Dragonite, Zekrom, Hydreigon-EX, and Thundurus-EX, the Pokémon TCG: XY—Roaring Skies expansion calls you to battle higher, faster, stronger—and with all-new boosts like Mega Turbo and Double Dragon Energy cards, the sky's the limit! Ascend to the clouds and soar to victory!
product.xy6.booster.retro.shop-disclaime: These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/3/2018
product.xy7.booster.description: Power of the Ancient Days!\nReady for some new tricks? Hoopa-EX brings new Mythical power to the Pokémon world, along with fierce new challengers like Mega Tyranitar-EX, Mega Ampharos-EX, and Mega Sceptile-EX! The Pokémon TCG: XY—Ancient Origins expansion transforms ancient secrets into modern battling techniques, with all-new Special Energy cards, new Ancient Traits, and Shiny versions of Primal Kyogre-EX, Primal Groudon-EX, and Mega Rayquaza-EX! The power of the ancients is unbound!
product.xy7.booster.retro.description: Power of the Ancient Days! Ready for some new tricks? Hoopa-EX brings new Mythical power to the Pokémon world, along with fierce new challengers like Mega Tyranitar-EX, Mega Ampharos-EX, and Mega Sceptile-EX! The Pokémon TCG: XY—Ancient Origins expansion transforms ancient secrets into modern battling techniques, with all-new Special Energy cards, new Ancient Traits, and Shiny versions of Primal Kyogre-EX, Primal Groudon-EX, and Mega Rayquaza-EX! The power of the ancients is unbound! Available for a limited time!
product.xy7.booster.retro.shop-disclaime: These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition.\n\nOffer Expires: 1/10/2018
product.xy8.booster.description: Parallel Worlds: Two Paths to Power!\nAn amazing discovery! Pokémon BREAK Evolution opens a new path to power that builds on a Pokémon's existing strengths and creates all-new battling options! These new Pokémon BREAK come from twin worlds, home to Zoroark BREAK, Mega Mewtwo X, and Mega Mewtwo Y. One world of technology, one world of nature, and all the wonders of BREAK Evolution are yours to explore in the Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKthrough expansion!
product.xy9.booster.description: The hour grows desperate, and two worlds stand at the brink! The Pokémon TCG: XY—BREAKpoint expansion reveals the growing rift between the twin worlds, first discovered by Shiny Mega Gyarados-EX. As the rift tears through the skies, more Pokémon are drawn into the struggle, including Greninja BREAK, Luxray BREAK, and Mega Scizor-EX! Can they mend the rift and save both worlds from collision chaos?
product.xy9.pcd.electriceye.name: Electric Eye
product.xy9.pcd.waveslasher.name: Wave Slasher
