systemnotification.title: System Notification
tc.cityleague.explanation.popup.label: Your rise through the Leagues is remarkable! You've made it to the final League: City Championship. You'll have to play your best to bring home the final trophy.
tc.deckunlocked.basicdeck.body: Congratulations! You've unlocked a new deck in your Collection!
tc.goldleague.explanation.popup.label: Welcome to the Trainer Challenge! You'll be competing against other Trainers for the Gold League Trophy. You'll also earn exciting rewards along the way. Good luck!
tc.infodialog.basicdecks.body: We've given you three basic theme decks to start. Each time you win with one of those decks, you'll unlock new cards for it. Win 7 times to unlock the whole deck and add it to your collection!
tc.infodialog.overview.body: Welcome to Trainer Challenge! In this mode, you'll use theme decks to compete against AI Trainers in three different Leagues to earn rewards!
tc.infodialog.redeemed.body: Each theme deck you redeem can be played in Trainer Challenge mode. You can redeem some theme decks in the Shop using Trainer Tokens, or you can redeem code cards from a theme deck you've purchased. Winning 12 games with a redeemed theme deck gives you a booster pack!
tc.infodialog.rewards.body: Each time you defeat a Trainer with a unique deck, you'll earn a star. The first three stars reward you with Trainer Tokens. Each star you earn makes that Trainer harder to defeat the next time you play. Earn all four stars to win a booster pack! If you earn four stars on all the Trainers in a League, you'll win even more booster packs!
tc.league.championship.game1.loadscreen2: Oh, those guys? They're my brother's friends.
tc.league.championship.game1.loadscreen3: I said you guys were good, and they wanted to see for themselves…
tc.league.championship.game1.playerloss1: Oh YEAH! Victory against all odds!
tc.league.championship.game1.playerloss2: Against all comers! That means YOU, champ!
tc.league.championship.game1.playerwin2: With Daniel and Rika around, I'm a second-stringer.
tc.league.championship.game1.playerwin3: I'll tell you a secret, though: YOU are too...
tc.league.championship.game1.pregame3: or else you're gonna get checked to the boards!
tc.league.championship.game10.loadscreen: That was quite an outpouring of local pride.
But pride doesn't win games. Nor do hurt feelings.
tc.league.championship.game10.playerloss: Mmm. I think I know where you went wrong there.
If you want, I can walk you through it.
Why don't we play again while we're at it?
tc.league.championship.game10.playerwin1: One victory is luck. A run of victories is skill.
tc.league.championship.game10.playerwin3: Good luck. I hope you go the distance…
tc.league.championship.game10.pregame1: I misjudged you the last time we played.
tc.league.championship.game10.pregame2: You clearly have the skill to win this tournament.
tc.league.championship.game10.pregame3: But do you have the fire? The drive? The WILL to prevail?
tc.league.championship.game11.loadscreen: Sweet! We both made it past the quarterfinals.
No hard feelings, whatever happens, OK?
Promise me you'll take home the trophy if you win!
tc.league.championship.game11.playerloss: Sorry. Didn't mean to hurt your feelings.
It's just good to win, you know? I'll take down Daniel for ya!
tc.league.championship.game11.playerwin1: Shock! Horror! The three-time champ wins again!
tc.league.championship.game11.playerwin2: Seriously, though, I'm pulling for you. All of us are.
tc.league.championship.game11.playerwin3: Don't let Daniel steal our city championship!
tc.league.championship.game11.pregame1: You beat Rika, right? I saw her giving tips to Calvin and Juji.
tc.league.championship.game11.pregame2: She seems OK. Daniel, though… Well, he takes winning for granted.
tc.league.championship.game12.loadscreen: I had a feeling it would come to this.
I'm glad to have a worthy opponent.
tc.league.championship.game12.playerloss: Still, a win is a win, right?
Now, if you'll hand me my trophy…
tc.league.championship.game12.playerwin1: And the home team is victorious! Congratulations.
tc.league.championship.game12.playerwin3: I hope to see you at the State Championship...
tc.league.championship.game12.pregame1: This is it, then. One game for all the marbles.
tc.league.championship.game2.loadscreen1: These guys played at the World Championships?
tc.league.championship.game2.loadscreen2: Why do they want to pick on US?
tc.league.championship.game2.playerloss3: Come on, let's play another game!
tc.league.championship.game2.playerwin2: At least I made you work for it this time!
tc.league.championship.game2.playerwin3: Let me know if you have any tips?
tc.league.championship.game2.pregame1: I wanted to show everyone how much I'd improved…
tc.league.championship.game2.pregame2: but that Rika girl acted like I didn't know the rules!
tc.league.championship.game2.pregame3: Well, I can show YOU, anyway.
tc.league.championship.game3.loadscreen1: Hey, {0}. That big guy, Otis, is one cool customer.
tc.league.championship.game3.loadscreen2: Hardly said a word while we were playing.
tc.league.championship.game3.loadscreen3: He must have ice water in his veins…
tc.league.championship.game3.playerloss2: You've got to keep your cool. Keep it together.
tc.league.championship.game3.playerloss3: Want to give it another try? I know you can do this.
tc.league.championship.game3.playerwin2: You didn't sweat that for a moment, did you?
tc.league.championship.game3.playerwin3: Keep that up, and you'll take home the trophy!
tc.league.championship.game3.pregame2: She lost to the new girl—Rika?—last round.
tc.league.championship.game3.pregame3: Well, no use in whining. Let's battle!
tc.league.championship.game4.loadscreen3: Your manners are better than those of SOME people around here…
tc.league.championship.game4.playerloss2: I expected better of a three-time champion.
tc.league.championship.game4.playerloss3: Play again? Strictly for fun, of course.
tc.league.championship.game4.playerwin1: Capable, polite, AND gracious in victory?
tc.league.championship.game4.playerwin2: Good. I was worried this was a waste of time.
tc.league.championship.game4.playerwin3: May we meet again…in the finals.
tc.league.championship.game4.pregame2: That's all you need to win at Pokémon.
tc.league.championship.game4.pregame3: Let's see how your skills stack up.
tc.league.championship.game5.loadscreen1: Hey. It's kinda tense in here, huh?
tc.league.championship.game5.loadscreen2: I like the game, but I wouldn't fly to other cities to play!
tc.league.championship.game5.loadscreen3: I guess that's what dedication looks like.
tc.league.championship.game5.playerloss2: If I make the finals, I'll have to ditch my play rehearsal.
tc.league.championship.game5.playerloss3: Let's try that again! Don't let me down this time!
tc.league.championship.game5.playerwin1: Heh, it looks like YOU found a balance…
tc.league.championship.game5.playerwin2: between decisive victory and total humiliation!
tc.league.championship.game5.playerwin3: Good job! I guess I'll make it to rehearsal after all.
tc.league.championship.game5.pregame1: Don't get me wrong. I care about the game!
tc.league.championship.game5.pregame2: I just won't let it take over my life.
tc.league.championship.game5.pregame3: You've gotta find a balance, right?
tc.league.championship.game6.playerloss3: Want a rematch? Show me what you're made of...
tc.league.championship.game6.playerwin1: Good game. Rika was right about you.
tc.league.championship.game6.pregame1: You really want to win, huh?
tc.league.championship.game7.loadscreen2: I need to win every game from here on out to make Top 8…
tc.league.championship.game7.loadscreen3: and that means you're going DOWN.
tc.league.championship.game7.playerloss1: The natural order is restored, and *I* am victorious!
tc.league.championship.game7.playerloss2: What's that? You want a rematch?
tc.league.championship.game7.playerloss3: Oh, sure, why not. It's not like you'll win.
tc.league.championship.game7.playerwin1: Look at you. Crushing others' dreams for the sake of YOUR ambition.
tc.league.championship.game7.pregame1: Did you play that Rika chick?
tc.league.championship.game7.pregame2: She offered to give me tips. Me!
tc.league.championship.game7.pregame3: Can you BELIEVE that? Of all the nerve!
tc.league.championship.game8.loadscreen1: Ah, {0}. I've heard a lot about you.
tc.league.championship.game8.loadscreen2: Time to test your skills for myself…
tc.league.championship.game8.playerloss2: Still, you gave me a run for my money.
tc.league.championship.game8.playerloss3: Again? I wouldn't mind seeing more of your deck…
tc.league.championship.game8.playerwin1: Well, played, {0}. My first loss of the day.
tc.league.championship.game8.playerwin2: I expect to meet you in the finals.
tc.league.championship.game8.pregame2: It's true. I haven't dropped a game.
tc.league.championship.game8.pregame3: Let's see if YOU can break my winning streak…
tc.league.championship.game9.loadscreen2: You just played Daniel? I feel for ya.
tc.league.championship.game9.loadscreen3: He's friendly once the game's over, but while you're playing…brr.
tc.league.championship.game9.playerloss1: Sorry, buddy. That was kind of a beating, huh?
tc.league.championship.game9.playerloss2: I guess I don't know my own strength.
tc.league.championship.game9.playerloss3: You want a shame-breaker? Let's try that again.
tc.league.championship.game9.playerwin1: Good match, {0}. I thought I had you there!
tc.league.championship.game9.playerwin2: Let's check the rankings. See who made it to the quarterfinals.
tc.league.championship.game9.pregame1: Our cohort's really been taking body blows today.
tc.league.championship.game9.pregame2: You knocked out Cammie. Calvin's on the brink…
tc.league.championship.game9.pregame3: If one of us doesn't win, we'll have a pro for our champion!
tc.league.diamond.complete: You are the Diamond League Champion!
tc.league.gold.complete: You are the Gold League Champion!
tc.league.gold.game1.loadscreen2: This is what I live for!
tc.league.gold.game1.playerloss2: But it looks like you met your match!
tc.league.gold.game1.playerwin2: Looks like you'll fit right in.
tc.league.gold.game1.playerwin3: Say hi to Mick for me when you play!
tc.league.gold.game10.loadscreen2: I've enjoyed seeing your progress in this League!
tc.league.gold.game10.playerloss1: Your face is looking mighty pale.
tc.league.gold.game10.playerloss3: Tee-hee! Well played, {0}. Let's rematch, OK?
tc.league.gold.game10.playerwin2: You knocked the stuffing out of my deck!
tc.league.gold.game10.playerwin3: Go for the Gold. I believe in you!
tc.league.gold.game10.pregame2: But it sure is nice! Especially in a tournament!
tc.league.gold.game11.loadscreen2: Are you bidding to become my...rival?
tc.league.gold.game11.playerloss1: The wheels of justice grind slow but fine...
tc.league.gold.game11.playerloss3: Try again? I want to know my win wasn't luck!
tc.league.gold.game11.playerwin1: So much for my strong-as-steel Metal deck...
tc.league.gold.game11.playerwin2: You crumpled it! Like aluminum foil!
tc.league.gold.game11.playerwin3: Still, I gotta admit you played great. I’ll cheer for you in the finals!
tc.league.gold.game11.pregame1: They say I have a heart of gold...
tc.league.gold.game11.pregame2: until they face me in an important match.
tc.league.gold.game12.loadscreen1: I thought winning this Championship would be easy.
tc.league.gold.game12.loadscreen3: Now it's a piece of cake!
tc.league.gold.game12.playerloss1: Yes!! All light has turned to DARKNESS!
tc.league.gold.game12.playerloss3: Why are you still here? To re-enact my triumph?
tc.league.gold.game12.playerwin2: Clearly I took you too lightly!
tc.league.gold.game12.pregame1: I promise to still be friends, win or lose...
tc.league.gold.game12.pregame2: Especially if I win and you lose!
tc.league.gold.game2.pregame2: Am I scared? Not a bit.
tc.league.gold.game2.pregame3: Just "good" isn't enough to beat me!
tc.league.gold.game3.playerloss2: You just got DUNKED by my Water deck!
tc.league.gold.game3.playerloss3: Would you like to play again?
tc.league.gold.game3.playerwin3: If I can't beat you, my sister Penelope will!
tc.league.gold.game3.pregame2: This is the first League I've played in.
tc.league.gold.game3.pregame3: Take it easy on me, OK?
tc.league.gold.game4.loadscreen1: I had a feeling we'd be meeting soon.
tc.league.gold.game4.playerloss1: I really don't like to brag...
tc.league.gold.game4.playerwin2: I guess my victory just wasn't in the cards.
tc.league.gold.game4.pregame2: I'm afraid to say...it doesn't look too bright.
tc.league.gold.game4.pregame3: Still, the spirits and I bid you GOOD LUCK!
tc.league.gold.game5.playerloss3: Did I steal your thunder? Let's have a rematch!
tc.league.gold.game5.playerwin1: What?! You beat my Lightning deck?
tc.league.gold.game5.pregame2: Excuse me, was I singing out loud?
tc.league.gold.game5.pregame3: Good luck! This should be over in a FLASH!
tc.league.gold.game6.loadscreen1: Hey, I'm Juji. Welcome to the League!
tc.league.gold.game6.loadscreen2: You played Ali, right? Isn't she cool?
tc.league.gold.game6.playerloss2: I guess it's true: act confident and the rest follows!
tc.league.gold.game6.playerwin1: Yowza! Um. Jeepers! Oh, that's no good either!
tc.league.gold.game6.playerwin2: I wonder what Ali and Brittney would say when they lose?
tc.league.gold.game6.playerwin3: *ahem* Good win! Hope to play you again soon.
tc.league.gold.game6.pregame1: Mick told me I should work on my trash talk.
tc.league.gold.game6.pregame2: So, uh...you don't have a FIGHTING chance of winning!
tc.league.gold.game7.loadscreen1: Hey, {0}. You've done well so far.
tc.league.gold.game7.loadscreen2: Let's see which of our decks has the EDGE.
tc.league.gold.game7.playerloss1: Good game. That was closer than I expected.
tc.league.gold.game7.playerloss2: But my high degree of SKILL has prevailed.
tc.league.gold.game7.playerwin2: You defeated a statistically superior opponent!
tc.league.gold.game7.playerwin3: I guess there’s a first for everything! Hope to meet you in the finals!
tc.league.gold.game7.pregame1: I play a lot of Pokémon games on my DS...
tc.league.gold.game7.pregame2: But human opponents are way more fun.
tc.league.gold.game7.pregame3: Good luck! Don't make this too easy!
tc.league.gold.game8.loadscreen2: No boxing or food jokes, please.
tc.league.gold.game8.loadscreen3: I get enough of those from Mick.
tc.league.gold.game8.playerloss2: Winning gets me all worked up.
tc.league.gold.game8.playerwin2: I can see you're going to be a real contender.
tc.league.gold.game9.loadscreen1: So, I hear you defeated my brother. I stick up for my family!
tc.league.gold.game9.playerloss1: Ha, ha, ha! Gaze into my crystal ball!
tc.league.gold.game9.playerwin1: Wow. My Psychic and Water deck just EVAPORATED.
tc.league.gold.game9.playerwin2: Ffft! So much for avenging Calvin!!
tc.league.platinum.complete: You are the Platinum League Champion!
tc.league.platinum.game1.loadscreen1: Oh yeah! League Champion in the house!
tc.league.platinum.game1.playerwin1: Wow, you've come a long way.
tc.league.platinum.game1.playerwin2: My Water deck is...all washed up!
tc.league.platinum.game1.pregame2: Let's see how you hold up under pressure...
tc.league.platinum.game10.loadscreen1: I hope you realize who you're facing off against.
tc.league.platinum.game10.loadscreen2: I won't take it easy on you just because this is your second League!
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerloss1: They say I used to be a spoiled brat.
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerloss2: You don't believe that, do you?
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerloss3: I'm really very nice when I get what I want.
tc.league.platinum.game10.playerwin3: That's no way to treat anybody! Behave yourself!
tc.league.platinum.game10.pregame1: To show you how thoughtful I am, I brought you some tissues.
tc.league.platinum.game10.pregame3: That way, you won't cry all over your deck! Haha!
tc.league.platinum.game11.loadscreen1: Hey, {0}. I figured I would face you again.
tc.league.platinum.game11.loadscreen2: I got all pumped by listening to my favorite bands.
tc.league.platinum.game11.playerloss3: Good game. Better luck next time!
tc.league.platinum.game11.playerwin2: My driving beat...turned into a total beatdown!
tc.league.platinum.game11.playerwin3: Still, you played well. Good luck!
tc.league.platinum.game11.pregame1: I won't let this end like last time.
tc.league.platinum.game11.pregame2: I can still hear samples and synths in my head.
tc.league.platinum.game12.loadscreen2: But this time...victory will be mine!
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerloss1: You gave it your all! But you're down for the count.
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerwin1: Holy cow! You knocked my block off!
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerwin2: If we were fighting for real, I'd have a concussion!
tc.league.platinum.game12.playerwin3: Let's face it, {0}—you win! Good game!
tc.league.platinum.game12.pregame1: I've been waiting for this moment.
tc.league.platinum.game12.pregame2: All of my training is about to pay off.
tc.league.platinum.game12.pregame3: Come on, {0}! Give me your best shot!
tc.league.platinum.game2.loadscreen2: Don't hold back! I can take it!
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerloss1: Lost, huh? I've been studying up!
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerloss2: I guess my botanical approach to the game paid off.
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerloss3: Still, you're looking rather green. Care to play me again?
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerwin1: Huh, that sure showed me! I thought I was a seasoned player...
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerwin2: But I guess I'm still as green as Grass!
tc.league.platinum.game2.playerwin3: Well played! Good luck with the rest of the League!
tc.league.platinum.game2.pregame1: Wait, you're not new? League Champion, huh?
tc.league.platinum.game2.pregame2: Man, and here I thought this would be an easy match...
tc.league.platinum.game3.loadscreen2: Congratulations on winning the Gold League!
tc.league.platinum.game3.loadscreen3: Maybe this time I'll meet you in the finals!
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerloss2: And I totally TOASTED you today.
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerloss3: You can do better than that. Give it another try?
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerwin1: Nicely played! I thought I was going to serve you up...
tc.league.platinum.game3.playerwin2: but I was the one whose goose got cooked!
tc.league.platinum.game3.pregame1: Ella's been giving me some tips...
tc.league.platinum.game3.pregame2: so this won't be as easy as last time!
tc.league.platinum.game4.loadscreen1: So, {0}! Got your eyes on the prize?
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerloss3: Let me know when you're ready for another title shot!
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerwin1: Whoa, where did that come from?
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerwin2: You hit me with a HAYMAKER!
tc.league.platinum.game4.playerwin3: Well done! You deserve to be Champion!
tc.league.platinum.game4.pregame1: They say the best defense is a good offense...
tc.league.platinum.game4.pregame2: and who am I to argue?
tc.league.platinum.game5.loadscreen2: Sorry I was so shy...you know. Before.
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerloss1: Don't feel bad. Everyone's nerves get to them sometimes.
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerloss2: Mine get to me a LOT!
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerloss3: Want to give it another go?
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerwin2: But you kept it together and played well!
tc.league.platinum.game5.playerwin3: Good game! You might even become Champion!
tc.league.platinum.game5.pregame1: You've done well to get this far, {0}.
tc.league.platinum.game6.loadscreen1: Heya! Ya know, I'm the odds-on favorite in this matchup!
tc.league.platinum.game6.loadscreen2: I hate to brag, but numbers don't lie!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerloss1: Woo! My victory is no surprise...but it's still a thrill!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerloss2: I love winning ALMOST as much as math.
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerloss3: Let's play again. Maybe you can buck the odds!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerwin1: Wow, nice. Looks like you bent the odds in your favor!
tc.league.platinum.game6.playerwin2: If you keep playing this well, I'll see you in the finals!
tc.league.platinum.game7.playerloss2: You can't win 'em all, I suppose.
tc.league.platinum.game7.playerwin2: I thought my Water and Psychic deck had all the answers...
tc.league.platinum.game7.playerwin3: But I guess some things are best left...unexplained.
tc.league.platinum.game7.pregame1: I don't know if you're popular at school...
tc.league.platinum.game7.pregame2: But you've been making quite a name for yourself 'round here.
tc.league.platinum.game8.loadscreen1: So you won the last League, huh?
tc.league.platinum.game8.loadscreen2: Good thing I play hockey. Why?
tc.league.platinum.game8.loadscreen3: Cause soon I'll be skating to a victory...
tc.league.platinum.game8.playerloss1: What a game! I'm the Wayne Gretzky of Pokémon!
tc.league.platinum.game8.playerloss2: And I'm humble, too, eh? Ha-ha.
tc.league.platinum.game8.playerwin3: Good luck in the finals, eh? I'm pulling for you.
tc.league.platinum.game8.pregame1: Are you prepared to throw down?
tc.league.platinum.game8.pregame2: I'm ready to drop the gloves anytime!
tc.league.platinum.game9.loadscreen2: My deck will light you up like the Fourth of July!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerloss2: but that was an incredibly awesome win! Yeeeeeah!!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerloss3: OK. Deep breath. Calming down now. Let's play again!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerwin2: I knew you were good, but not THAT good!
tc.league.platinum.game9.playerwin3: Great game! You've come a long way, {0}.
tc.league.platinum.game9.pregame1: I asked Juji to tell me some of your tricks...
tc.league.platinum.game9.pregame3: What kind of friend is that?
tc.matchmaking.menu.error.body: Uh-oh, {0} can't play right now. Try again later.

tc.platinumleague.explanation.popup.labe: Congratulations on your victory! Winners from the Gold League are entered into the Platinum League. The Trainers are tougher, but I think you've got what it takes!
tc.popup.firstunlock.body: You have defeated your first opponent in the Trainer Challenge! The first time you defeat each opponent, your deck will update by adding more exciting and powerful cards while removing weaker cards. After 11 victories, your deck will be fully unlocked!
tc.popup.losetwogames.body: In the Trainer Challenge, you can switch out your deck between games. When your opponent has many Pokémon of a type your deck is weak to, it is very difficult to win. You may want to try using a different deck for the next game.

tpci.data.decks.pcds.solarstrike.retro.d: The valiant Sun Pokémon Volcarona commands the battlefield in the Solar Strike theme deck! As it torments your opponents with the Leech Life attack and calls reinforcements with Solar Transporter, Glalie and Ursaring move into position for their own fiendish offensive, and Blastoise's Deluge Ability ensures your attacks have the Energy they need. It won't be long before your foes are blinded by your brilliance!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.bundles.mindwipebundl: The powerful Paleozoic Pokémon Genesect explodes into action in the Mind Wipe theme deck! As its Jet Impact attack deals devastating destruction, Reuniclus reduces retaliation with Barrier Attack, and Kangaskhan pulls Pokémon into play with Call for Family. As this bewildering onslaught comes to a close, your rivals will be mired in the memories of their defeats!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.pcds.bw7coldfirepcd.r: Watch foes feel the heat as White Kyurem sets your game ablaze in the Cold Fire theme deck! Send opponents on a slippery downward spiral with Samurott's Destructive Whirlpool attack, and run rings around them as they try to fend off Darmanitan's ferocious Damage Counterpunch attack. And, with Delibird, Delcatty, and Dunsparce delivering you deck-searching delights to drive the flames ever higher, your opponents will be going out…but not in a blaze of glory!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.pcds.bw7iceshockpcd.r: Feel the chill as Black Kyurem takes center stage in the electrifying Ice Shock theme deck! Foes have no time to stop and stare as Black Kyurem unleashes its electrifying Flash Freeze attack, and with Jellicent's Stickiness Ability, they won't even be able to run and hide! The jolts continue as Lopunny takes time out from healing to drive the Defending Pokémon back to the Bench, helping Electivire blow your opponents' fuses as it delivers punishing attacks to Benched Pokémon. Can those who stand in your way avoid the blackout?\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.pcds.bw8plasmaclawpcd: Lightning strikes and opponents feel the burn as the Cave Dragon Pokémon Druddigon explodes into action with the ferocious Dragon Claw attack! Infernape's Malevolent Fire attack fans the flames of your foes' defeat, and there's no skin thick enough to cope with Sharpedo's Rough Skin Ability. Once Jellicent drifts into range and its Spiteful Spirit Ability takes hold, even opponents with the cloudiest of minds will know the truth: they can't claw their way back into the game when you play the Plasma Claw theme deck!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.pcds.bw8plasmashadowp: Shadows loom and sparks fly as the Renegade Pokémon Giratina lays a Hex on any Pokémon that stands against it! A devastating chain reaction becomes a terrifying reality once Amoonguss gets in on the action with its damage-boosting Miracle Powder attack, and a shocking aftermath is inescapable once Weezing unleashes its Aftermath attack. Finally, as Watchog shows its teeth and snaps around the heels of fleeing Pokémon with its Second Bite attack, what once was murky will become blindingly clear: you'll cast a shadow over your foes with the Plasma Shadow theme deck!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.pcds.bw9frostraypcd.r: Freeze your foes with fear when you play the Frost Ray theme deck! Use Glaceon's Icy Wind attack to send opposing Pokémon into a cold, deep sleep, and Vanilluxe's powerful ChillMAX attack to let them know they're in for a rude awakening! You'll command the battlefield with superior speed using Glaceon's Freeze Zone Ability, and help keep the Energy flowing with Electrode's Magnetic Draw. Then, as you call Team Plasma Pokémon and Trainer cards from the discard pile with Raticate's Transfer Junk attack, your opponents will know anyone unwary enough to challenge you will be put on ice!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.data.products.pcds.bw9psycrusherpcd: Mash your opponents' minds with mental might when you play the Psy Crusher theme deck! Use Leafeon's Energy Crush attack to turn the power of opposing Pokémon on themselves, and make sure no Pokémon can escape when you unleash Cofagrigus's Elongating Arms attack! Espeon keeps the reinforcements coming with Psy Alert, and Muk deals damage and heals itself. Then, when Beedrill Confuses and Poisons using Swift Sting, it won't take a mind-reader to know that the shattered remnants of the forces facing you have been crushed!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.product.20th.arceus.sleeve.name: Generations Arceus Card Sleeves
tpci.product.20th.darkrai.sleeve.name: Generations Darkrai Card Sleeves

tpci.product.alolan.starter.coin.name: Silver Rainbow Alola Partners Coin
tpci.product.battle-arena.black-kyurem.d: Black Kyurem and White Kyurem go head to head in the new Pokémon TCG Battle Arena Decks! These two 60-card decks are ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer! Each deck is led by an exceptional Pokémon-EX and includes 11 foil cards. Let the battle begin!
tpci.product.battle-arena.black-kyurem.h: Two Mighty Pokémon Battle for Victory!
tpci.product.battle-arena.kyurem.title: Battle Arena Decks: Black Kyurem vs. White Kyurem
tpci.product.battle-arena.white-kyurem.d: Black Kyurem and White Kyurem go head to head in the new Pokémon TCG Battle Arena Decks! These two 60-card decks are ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer! Each deck is led by an exceptional Pokémon-EX and includes 11 foil cards. Let the battle begin!
tpci.product.battle-arena.white-kyurem.h: Two Mighty Pokémon Battle for Victory!
tpci.product.bw1.booster.random.descript: Exciting New Discoveries, Powerful New Pokémon… More Epic Battles! A new generation of Pokémon has arrived! The Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White expansion brings you a legion of over 70 new Pokémon from the newly explored Unova region, including the Legendary Reshiram and Zekrom, both featuring never-before-seen art that covers the ENTIRE card! The Pokémon TCG: Black & White expansion is your gateway to a bigger Pokémon world! Available for a limited time!
tpci.product.bw2.booster.retro.descripti: Forces Unveiled, Strengths Revealed… Powers Emerged! The secrets of the Unova region are now yours to command! In the Pokémon TCG: Black & White—Emerging Powers expansion, astonishing new Pokémon are available for the very first time, including the rare and powerful Legendary Pokémon Cobalion, Terrakion, Virizion, Thundurus, and Tornadus! With brand-new Item cards to revitalize your deck, the Black & White—Emerging Powers expansion offers Trainers all of the amazing new strategies of Unova! Available for a limited time!
tpci.product.bw4.booster.retro.descripti: Expect a Battle-Filled Destiny with Pokémon-EX! The Pokémon Trading Card Game: Black & White—Next Destinies expansion is loaded with powerful Pokémon-EX to give you extraordinary excitement! Discover great Pokémon like Reshiram-EX and Zekrom-EX, and even Pokémon from beyond the Unova region, like Mewtwo-EX. Next Destinies delivers your destiny: Pokémon with exceptional HP, Special Energy and Trainer cards with expanded powers, and expert strategies to extend your victory streaks! Available for a limited time!
tpci.product.etb.sm2.tapu-koko-gx.deckbo: An Elite Trainer deck box featuring the Legendary Pokémon Tapu Koko!
tpci.product.generic.sleeve.b.descriptio: Throw your Pokémon into battle! A swirling Poké Ball keeps your deck looking sharp.
tpci.product.generic.sleeve.b.name: Crystalline Poké Ball Card Sleeves
tpci.product.generic.sleeve.c.descriptio: Throw your Pokémon into battle! A swirling Poké Ball keeps your deck looking cool.
tpci.product.generic.sleeve.c.name: Deep Red Poké Ball Card Sleeves
tpci.product.gx-promo.bundle.name: Pokémon-GX Bonus
tpci.product.ho-oh.battle.deck.coin.name: Gold Ho-Oh Coin
tpci.product.legendary.battle.deck.ho-oh: Fly above it all with the Legendary Rainbow Pokémon Ho-Oh and the Pokémon TCG: Legendary Battle Deck! This 60-card deck is ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer. Let the battle begin!
tpci.product.legendary.battle.deck.lugia: Befriend the Legendary Diving Pokémon Lugia with the Pokémon TCG: Legendary Battle Deck! This 60-card deck is ready to play right away, with powerful cards and winning strategies worthy of an ace Trainer. Let the battle begin!
tpci.product.mega-camerupt.coin.name: Silver Ice Mega Camerupt Coin
tpci.product.mega-sharpedo.coin.name: Silver Ice Mega Sharpedo Coin
tpci.product.pcd.decidueye.deck.name: Forest Shadow
tpci.product.pcd.incineroar.deck.name: Roaring Heat
tpci.product.pcd.primarina.deck.name: Bright Tide
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck1.name: Forest Shadow
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck1.tagline: Your Adventure in a New Region Starts Now!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck1.text: Moving through the trees with ultimate stealth: Decidueye! This hard-striking deck paints a target on your foe—and hits the bull's-eye. Take aim with the Forest Shadow theme deck!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck2.name: Roaring Heat
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck2.tagline: Your Adventure in a New Region Starts Now!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck2.text: Explode with the fiery power of Incineroar! Add fuel to the fire with a fast-burning, fast-punching team built of pure power and aggression. Throw it all into the fight with the Roaring Heat theme deck!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck3.name: Bright Tide
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck3.tagline: Your Adventure in a New Region Starts Now!
tpci.product.pcd.sm1.deck3.text: Light up the waters and overwhelm your foe with Primarina! Combine water and lightning, and send your Pokémon team surging through howling storms with the Bright Tide theme deck!
tpci.product.pcd.sm2.booster.sell-text: Visit Alola for Pokémon fun, from the beaches to the mountain peaks—and discover new traditions and new challenges! Meet the island guardians Tapu Koko-GX and Tapu Lele-GX, and sharpen your skills with Kahuna Hala and Captain Mallow! Be amazed by the secret powers of Kommo-o-GX, Lycanroc-GX, Metagross-GX, Sylveon-GX, Toxapex-GX, Vikavolt-GX, and many more! Come to the islands, and seize the power of the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising expansion!
tpci.product.pcd.sm2.deck1.name: Steel Sun
tpci.product.pcd.sm2.deck1.sell-text: A Pokémon of fiery power: Solgaleo! This well-tempered deck puts both Metal and Psychic power in your hands—and tests your opponent’s mettle. Stay sharp with the Steel Sun theme deck!
tpci.product.pcd.sm2.deck2.name: Hidden Moon
tpci.product.pcd.sm2.deck2.sell-text: Hurtling across the sky on purple wings, Lunala leads a fiery crew of Pokémon! Keep your Pokémon evolving and bide your time until you reveal the power of the Hidden Moon theme deck!
tpci.product.pcds.bw1blueassaultpcd.rand: Your opponents will soon find themselves in troubled waters with the Blue Assault theme deck, especially when you unleash Galvantula! Its Electroweb attack is sure to leave them in sticky situations, and its Leech Life attack will keep your own Pokémon going strong! Use Basculin's Crunch attack to leave your opponent's Pokémon high and dry while Professor Juniper brings you calm waters. Will you be able to batter the opposition with the Blue Assault theme deck?\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.product.pcds.bw1greentornadopcd.ran: Play the Green Tornado theme deck to blow away the opposition while sheltering your own Pokémon with Serperior's Leaf Storm attack! Then, bring Sawsbuck into the action and overwhelm your opponent's Pokémon with its "the greener, the meaner" Nature Power attack! And if your opponents can weather the storm with tough Pokémon, let them ride it out in peaceful slumbers with Musharna's Hypnotic Ray attack! With the Green Tornado theme deck, will you whirl your way to victory?\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.product.pcds.bw1redfrenzypcd.random: Unleash a firestorm in the Red Frenzy theme deck with the mighty Mega Fire Pig Pokémon Emboar! Feeling burned out after its tremendous Flare Blitz attack? Well, fan the flames with the Energy Retrieval Trainer card and reignite with Emboar's Heat Crash attack! Then, add fuel to the fire and insult to injury with Stoutland's Giga Impact attack! Let your opponents feel the heat when you play the Red Frenzy theme deck!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
Heavy hitters deliver pure power: it's up to you to control it! Gigalith rumbles into action with the Rock Bullet attack, and the Intimidation Pokémon Krookodile can make other Pokémon pull their punches every time it uses its sneaky Black Eyes Ability. Your opponents will be on the ropes as even little Minccino gets in on the action, packing a mighty punch for its mini size. With Pokémon chosen for their fighting fury, can your foes handle your power plays?\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.product.pcds.bw2toxictrickspcd.retr: Turn the tables on your opponents with the Toxic Tricks theme deck! Gothitelle's Mental Shock attack will confuse and confound your opponents, and Scolipede's poisonous double-dose Toxic Claws attack will leave your opponents feeling more than a little tricked! And, when Gothita gets in the mix with its sleep-inducing Hypnotic Gaze, your opponents will be Poisoned, Asleep, Confused, and beaten in no time!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.product.scizor-ex.box.name: Pokémon TCG: Scizor-EX Box
tpci.product.sl.booster.description: In each region, a handful of Pokémon stand apart as creatures of heroic stories and wild adventures: Zekrom, Latios, Mewtwo-GX, Entei-GX. Others are just whispers and rumors: mysterious Pokémon such as Keldeo, Shining Jirachi, Shining Volcanion—and many more! See and collect these astounding Pokémon of myth and legend with the Pokémon TCG: Shining Legends expansion!
tpci.product.sl.booster.tagline: Blaze a Bright Trail with Shining Pokémon!
tpci.product.sl.booster.wrap.name: Shining Legends Booster Pack
tpci.product.sl.etb.bundle.name: Shining Legends Elite Trainer Box: Shining Ho–Oh
tpci.product.sl.etb.deckbox.name: Elite Trainer Shining Ho-Oh Deck Box
tpci.product.sl.etb.sleeve.name: Elite Trainer Shining Ho–Oh Card Sleeves
tpci.product.sl.ho-oh.superpremium.bundl: Pokémon TCG: Shining Legends Super-Premium Collection Featuring Ho-Oh
tpci.product.sm1.pcd.sell-text: Welcome to the tropical Alola region! Start your journey with Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio, then seek out the Legendary Pokémon Solgaleo-GX and Lunala-GX to witness the awesome power of a new kind of Pokémon: each Pokémon-GX brings an attack so devastating that you can use only one of them per game! Discover dozens of never-before-seen Pokémon, Alola forms of some familiar favorites, and new ways to battle in the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon expansion!
tpci.product.sm2.etb.deckbox.sell-text: Visit Alola for Pokémon fun, from the beaches to the mountain peaks—and discover new traditions and new challenges! Meet the island guardians Tapu Koko-GX and Tapu Lele-GX, and sharpen your skills with Kahuna Hala and Captain Mallow! Be amazed by the secret powers of Kommo-o-GX, Lycanroc-GX, Metagross-GX, Sylveon-GX, Toxapex-GX, Vikavolt-GX, and many more! Come to the islands, and seize the power of the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising expansion!
tpci.product.sm2.pcd.steel-sun.coin.name: Orange Solgaleo Coin
tpci.product.sm3.booster.description: What strange fires lurk in the shadows? Minions of Team Skull and a cavalcade of new Pokémon stand ready to battle in the dark of night and in the blazing sun! Slug it out with new titans like Necrozma-GX, Marshadow-GX, and Tapu Fini-GX, or battle with trusty allies from Machamp-GX and Charizard-GX to Darkrai-GX and Ho-Oh-GX. Fight for what’s right with the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Burning Shadows expansion!
tpci.product.sm3.pcd.deck1.name: Rock Steady
tpci.product.sm3.pcd.deck1.sell-text: Steady nerves and a sharp punch: Lycanroc is ready to stand and fight! This hardworking deck puts both Fighting- and Psychic-type Pokémon at your fingertips—for strength of body and mind. Keep total focus with the Rock Steady theme deck!
tpci.product.sm3.pcd.deck2.name: Luminous Frost
tpci.product.sm3.pcd.deck2.sell-text: Alolan Ninetales is keeping it frosty—and its friends are super-hot! Opposites attract when you fuse Fire and Water types, offering two paths to victory. With passionate fire and cool moves, the Luminous Frost theme deck is all about a winning attitude!
tpci.product.sm3.sell-text: What strange fires lurk in the shadows? Minions of Team Skull and a cavalcade of new Pokémon stand ready to battle in the dark of night and in the blazing sun! Slug it out with new titans like Necrozma-GX, Marshadow-GX, and Tapu Fini-GX, or battle with trusty allies from Machamp-GX and Charizard-GX to Darkrai-GX and Ho-Oh-GX. Fight for what’s right with the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Burning Shadows expansion!
tpci.product.sm4.blister.sell-text: The mysterious Ultra Beasts have arrived, invading the Alola region as crimson-tinged Pokémon-GX: Nihilego-GX, Buzzwole-GX, Kartana-GX, and the ravenous Guzzlord-GX! Can Silvally-GX and the other allies of Alola defend the islands—or will the Ultra Beasts take control? Find out when you battle for the prize with the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Crimson Invasion expansion!
tpci.product.sm4.booster.description: The mysterious Ultra Beasts have arrived, invading the Alola region as crimson-tinged Pokémon-GX: Nihilego-GX, Buzzwole-GX, Kartana-GX, and the ravenous Guzzlord-GX! Can Silvally-GX and the other allies of Alola defend the islands—or will the Ultra Beasts take control? Find out when you battle for the prize with the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Crimson Invasion expansion!
tpci.product.sm4.pcd-1.deck.name: Destruction Fang
tpci.product.sm4.pcd-1.deck.sell-text: Armed with fangs, claws, and poison, Hydreigon and friends are ready to battle! This dangerous deck calls on Darkness- and Psychic-type Pokémon with howling fury and keen instincts. Make a furious attack work for you with the Destruction Fang theme deck!
tpci.product.sm4.pcd-2.deck.name: Clanging Thunder
tpci.product.sm4.pcd-2.deck.sell-text: Kommo-o makes a mighty noise in battle! With a thunderous crew of Fighting and Lightning types, you can tear it up with huge hits and powerful Pokémon. The Clanging Thunder theme deck is going extra-big at full volume!
tpci.product.sm4.pcd.sell-text: The mysterious Ultra Beasts have arrived, invading the Alola region as crimson-tinged Pokémon-GX: Nihilego-GX, Buzzwole-GX, Kartana-GX, and the ravenous Guzzlord-GX! Can Silvally-GX and the other allies of Alola defend the islands—or will the Ultra Beasts take control? Find out when you battle for the prize with the Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon—Crimson Invasion expansion!
tpci.product.tapu-bulu-gx.summer.tin.sel: Stand ready with the strange and fearsome Pokémon of Alola! Choose the electric mischief of Tapu Koko-GX or the relentless vines of Tapu Bulu-GX in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Island Guardians Tin. Each of these beautiful tins contains all the astonishing power of a strange and mysterious Pokémon-GX who stands as a defender of the land!
tpci.product.tapu-koko-gx.summer.tin.sel: Stand ready with the strange and fearsome Pokémon of Alola! Choose the electric mischief of Tapu Koko-GX or the relentless vines of Tapu Bulu-GX in the Pokémon Trading Card Game: Island Guardians Tin. Each of these beautiful tins contains all the astonishing power of a strange and mysterious Pokémon-GX who stands as a defender of the land!
tpci.product.tapu-koko.figure.collection: Pokémon TCG: Tapu Koko Figure Collection
tpci.product.tapu-koko.pin.collection.na: Pokémon TCG: Tapu Koko Pin Collection
tpci.product.tapu-koko.pin.collection.se: Tapu Koko is one of the guardian Pokémon of the Alola region, with a deep connection to the land itself! With the Tapu Koko Pin Collection, you get Tapu Koko both as a fun collector’s pin and as a never-before-seen foil promo card! Stand ready to guard the islands with Tapu Koko!
tpci.product.tk10.coin.name: Silver Rainbow Alolan Raichu Coin
tpci.product.tk10.deck.name: Midnight Surfer
tpci.product.tk11.bundle.name: Sun & Moon Trainer Kit—Alolan Sandslash & Alolan Ninetales
tpci.product.tk11.rotom-dex.coin.name: Silver Rainbow Rotom Dex Coin
tpci.product.tk9.pcd.swiftcurrent.descri: Pikachu Libre and Suicune lead the way in the Swift Current deck, combining their strength and speed to smash through the opposition! This deck brings together Water types like Frogadier and Seaking, Lightning types like Manectric and Electivire, and handy Trainer cards like Tierno into a team fully trained for battle. When these Pokémon join forces, they are ready to bring the fight to your opponent!
tpci.product.tk9.pcd.swiftcurrent.name: Swift Current
tpci.product.tk9.retail.description: Master the art of Pokémon battling with your favorite Pokémon—one card at a time! The Pokémon TCG: XY Trainer Kit—Pikachu Libre and Suicune gets you playing from the very first card you draw. And with fun and powerful Pokémon at your side, you'll be a Pokémon Trainer before you know it! This kit contains everything you need to learn, train, and win! Play both decks against each other, then combine them to create one bigger deck where Pikachu Libre and Suicune battle side by side! Or test your deck at a Pokémon League near you and in the Pokémon TCG Online! This step-by-step Trainer Kit includes: • Two 30-card decks, each with a specially selected foil card • Two guided game booklets to teach you how to play—card by card, step by step! • 2-player playmat with great game tips and rules on the reverse side • Damage counters and Special Condition markers • A game coin with a cool Pokémon design • An illustrated deck box to keep your new cards in • A code card for the Pokémon TCG Online!
tpci.product.tk9.retail.name: Swift Current
tpci.product.trainer-kit.10.lycanroc.alo: Master the art of Pokémon battling with your favorite Pokémon—one card at a time! The Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon Trainer Kit—Lycanroc & Alolan Raichu gets you playing from the very first card you draw. And with fun and powerful Pokémon at your side, you’ll be a Pokémon Trainer before you know it!\n\nThis kit contains everything you need to learn, train, and win! Play both decks against each other, then combine them to create one bigger deck where Lycanroc and Alolan Raichu battle side by side! Or test your deck at a Pokémon League near you and in the Pokémon TCG Online!
Pokémon TCG: Sun & Moon Trainer Kit—Lycanroc & Alolan Raichu
tpci.product.xy11.3-pk.a.description: Get in on the latest Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs from the new XY—Steam Siege expansion, a special holographic promo card featuring Rayquaza, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! INCLUDES: 3 booster packs, 1 coin, and a foil promo card!
tpci.product.xy11.3-pk.a.name: XY—Steam Siege 3-Pack Blister with Rayquaza
tpci.product.xy11.3-pk.b.description: Get in on the latest Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs from the new XY—Steam Siege expansion, a special holographic promo card featuring Azelf, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! INCLUDES: 3 booster packs, 1 coin, and a foil promo card!
tpci.product.xy11.3-pk.b.name: XY—Steam Siege 3-Pack Blister with Azelf
tpci.product.xy11.checklanea.description: Get in on the latest Pokémon TCG action with an awesome booster pack from the new XY—Steam Siege expansion, a special holographic promo card featuring Floette, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! INCLUDES: 1 XY—Steam Siege booster pack, 1 promo card, and 1 Pokémon coin
tpci.product.xy11.checklanea.name: XY—Steam Siege Blister Pack with Floette
tpci.product.xy11.checklaneb.description: Get in on the latest Pokémon TCG action with an awesome booster pack from the new XY—Steam Siege expansion, a special holographic promo card featuring Lucario, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection! INCLUDES: 1 XY—Steam Siege booster pack, 1 promo card, and 1 Pokémon coin
tpci.product.xy11.checklaneb.name: XY—Steam Siege Blister Pack with Lucario
tpci.product.xy12.3pack.blistera.descrip:
Give Your Collection a Boost!
Get in on the latest Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, 1 special holographic promo card featuring Black Kyurem, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection!

This offer runs through November 29, 2016.
tpci.product.xy12.3pack.blistera.name: XY—Evolutions 3-Pack Blister with Black Kyurem
tpci.product.xy12.3pack.blisterb.descrip:
Give Your Collection a Boost!

This offer runs through December 13, 2016.
tpci.product.xy12.3pk.blister.b.name: XY—Evolutions 3-Pack Blister with Braixen
tpci.product.xy12.checklanea.blister.des: Contains 1 XY—Evolutions booster pack, 1 promo card featuring Greninja, and 1 Pokémon coin\n\nThis offer runs through August 22, 2017.
tpci.product.xy12.checklanea.name: XY—Evolutions Blister Pack with Greninja
tpci.product.xy12.checklaneb.blister.des: Contains 1 XY—Evolutions booster pack, 1 promo card featuring Weezing, and 1 Pokémon coin\n\nThis offer runs through December 6, 2016.
tpci.product.xy12.checklaneb.name: XY—Evolutions Blister Pack with Weezing
tpci.product.xy9.booster.name: XY—BREAKpoint
tpci.product.xy9.pcd.electriceye.descrip: Command the gleaming eyes of Luxray and strike fast with the crackling fists of Electivire! Stare down your opponent with the hypnotic mastery and total focus of the Electric Eye theme deck!
tpci.product.xy9.pcd.waveslasher.descrip: Cut through waves and slash foes in the battle arena—flow like water and bend like grass! Greninja and Slowking come to your call in the Wave Slasher theme deck!
tpci.product.xy9elitetrainerbundle.name: XY—BREAKpoint Elite Trainer Box: Mega Gyarados
tpci.products.pcds.bw4explosiveedgepcd.r: Attack after devastating attack, you'll drive your opponents to the edge of defeat when you play the Explosive Edge theme deck! With Reshiram's fiery Blue Flare attack and Beartic's powerful Ambush attack, you'll blast your opponent's Pokémon turn after turn. And when Chandelure and Arcanine add even more cutting-edge attacks to your battles, you can expect every victory to be exceptional!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.products.pcds.bw4voltagevortexpcd.r: Get ready to watch your opponents spin out of control! The Voltage Vortex theme deck will shock them with every attack—from Zekrom's Bolt Strike to Luxray's Flash Impact…and beyond! Add the possibility of 160 damage when Raichu charges up its Slam attack, and your opponents will be waiting for the next jolt—your exciting victory!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.products.pcds.bw5raiderspcd.retro.d: The Coffin Pokémon Cofagrigus rises to do your bidding when you play the Raiders theme deck! Send Sableye to raid your discard pile for Item cards that, when you discard them from your hand, let Cofagrigus bury your opponent's Pokémon with damage. Then send Krookodile in with its Dark Clamp and Bombast attacks to pin down the Defending Pokémon before enshrouding it in darkness in search of a Knock Out. Prove that you are skilled enough to ensure that your raiders become victors!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.products.pcds.bw5shadowspcd.retro.d: When Zoroark emerges from the shadows, there won't be a shadow of a doubt about who will win! Even if Zoroark takes a hit or two, its Dark Rush attack does more damage for each damage counter on it. And while Empoleon uses its Diving Draw Ability to give you greater access to your deck, your other Pokémon can use their fast and effective attacks to do damage, cause Confusion, and then put out your opponent's lights. Make your opponents afraid of their own shadows when you play the Shadows theme deck!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.products.pcds.bw6dragonsnarlpcd.ret: When dragons snarl, opponents fall! With the DragonSnarl theme deck, Pokémon like Skuntank, Golurk, and Gothitelle lead the charge and pave the way for your powerhouse Dragon-type Pokémon, Hydreigon, to roar into battle! As the Brutal Pokémon brings its aggressive combination of healing and devastating attacks to combat, your opponents will hear their defeat because they hear your dragons snarl!\n\nAvailable for a limited time!
tpci.products.pcds.bw6dragonspeedpcd.ret: Foes must make way for the mighty Mach Pokémon Garchomp or quickly learn a furious lesson! But time and tide wait for no Pokémon, and your opponents will have much to fear before that terrible arrival: Walrein will bring watery doom, speedily delivering wave after wave of Aurora Beam and Ice Entomb attacks…and there will be no respite when Marowak gets in on the action with its heavy-hitting Vortex Chop! With nowhere to run and no time to catch breath, can anyone match the dragons' speed?\n\nAvailable for a limited time!

tutorial.game1.message1: Hello! I'm Professor Holly, and I'm going to teach you how to play the Pokémon Trading Card Game!
tutorial.game1.message1.ios: Hello! I'm Professor Holly, and I'm going to teach you how to play the Pokémon Trading Card Game!
tutorial.game1.message10: Smash Kick did 10 damage! Rattata has 40 HP, so 30 more damage is enough for a Knock Out. [34ff0f]Click anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message10.ios: Smash Kick did 10 damage! Rattata has 40 HP, so 30 more damage is enough for a Knock Out. [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message11: Eevee has a stronger attack that requires more Energy. [34ff0f]Attach another <img=symbols/lightning> Energy.[-]
tutorial.game1.message11.ios: Eevee has a stronger attack that requires more Energy. [34ff0f]Attach another <img=symbols/lightning> Energy.[-]
tutorial.game1.message12: Tail Whap costs two Energy of any type. Eevee has two <img=symbols/lightning> Energy attached, so you can use it now!
tutorial.game1.message12.ios: Tail Whap costs two Energy of any type. Eevee has two <img=symbols/lightning> Energy attached, so you can use it now!
tutorial.game1.message13: Zach's Rattata is almost Knocked Out. He'll put another Pokémon onto his Bench as backup. [34ff0f]Click anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message13.ios: Zach's Rattata is almost Knocked Out. He'll put another Pokémon onto his Bench as backup. [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message14: You just drew a Trainer card. [34ff0f]Right-click on Potion to take a closer look.[-]
tutorial.game1.message14.ios: You just drew a Trainer card. [34ff0f]Double-tap on Potion to take a closer look.[-]
tutorial.game1.message15: Trainer cards have special effects that can help you out. [34ff0f]Click on the playmat to unzoom Potion.[-]
tutorial.game1.message15.ios: Trainer cards have special effects that can help you out. [34ff0f]Tap on the playmat to unzoom Potion.[-]
tutorial.game1.message16: Let's use the Potion to heal Eevee! [34ff0f]Drag Potion onto Eevee.[-]
tutorial.game1.message16.ios: Let's use the Potion to heal Eevee! [34ff0f]Drag Potion onto Eevee.[-]
tutorial.game1.message17: Rattata only has 10 HP left! [34ff0f]Use Tail Whap to Knock Out Zach's Rattata![-]
tutorial.game1.message17.ios: Rattata only has 10 HP left! [34ff0f]Use Tail Whap to Knock Out Zach's Rattata![-]
tutorial.game1.message18: When you Knock Out a Pokémon, you get to take a Prize card! Take all of your Prize cards to win the game! [34ff0f]Click anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message18.ios: When you Knock Out a Pokémon, you get to take a Prize card! Take all of your Prize cards to win the game! [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message19: Now Zach will pick a Pokémon from his Bench to become his new Active Pokémon. [34ff0f]Click anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message19.ios: Now Zach will pick a Pokémon from his Bench to become his new Active Pokémon. [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message2: Let's take a look at a Pokémon card. [34ff0f]Right-click on Eevee to zoom in.[-] By the way, Zach will be helping us out today.
tutorial.game1.message2.ios: Let's take a look at a Pokémon card. [34ff0f]Double-tap on Eevee to zoom in.[-] By the way, Zach will be helping us out today.
tutorial.game1.message20: Meowth's Fury Swipes attack lets Zach flip three coins. For each heads, the attack does 10 damage! [34ff0f]Click anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message20.ios: Meowth's Fury Swipes attack lets Zach flip three coins. For each heads, the attack does 10 damage! [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message21: You drew Pikachu! You should put it onto your Bench just in case Eevee gets Knocked Out.
tutorial.game1.message21.ios: You drew Pikachu! You should put it onto your Bench just in case Eevee gets Knocked Out.
tutorial.game1.message22: Oh no! Eevee got Knocked Out, and Zach took a Prize card! Good thing you've got a Pokémon on your Bench! [34ff0f]Click anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message22.ios: Oh no! Eevee got Knocked Out, and Zach took a Prize card! Good thing you've got a Pokémon on your Bench! [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]
tutorial.game1.message23: One more attack should Knock Out Zach's Meowth, and since he doesn’t have any Pokémon on his Bench, you'll win the game!
tutorial.game1.message23.ios: One more attack should Knock Out Zach's Meowth, and since he doesn’t have any Pokémon on his Bench, you'll win the game!
tutorial.game1.message2b: This is my favorite game. I hope you have fun!
tutorial.game1.message2b.ios: This is my favorite game. I hope you have fun!
tutorial.game1.message3: As you can see, Eevee is a Basic Pokémon that has 50 HP and two attacks. [34ff0f]Click on the playmat to unzoom Eevee.[-]

tutorial.game1.message4.ios: You start by placing a Basic Pokémon in the active position. [34ff0f]Drag Eevee to the Active Pokémon position.[-]

tutorial.game1.message5.ios: Each player starts their turn by drawing a card. [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]

tutorial.game1.message6.ios: Energy allows Pokémon to attack; you can attach one per turn. Zach will attach a <img=symbols/metal> Energy to his Rattata. [34ff0f]Tap anywhere to continue.[-]

tutorial.game2.message0: My mom is a good teacher, right?

tutorial.game2.message7: Now that you know how to retreat and evolve your Pokémon, you’re ready to play on your own. Let’s see if you can win this game!

versusscreen.newuserexperience.guestlogi: If you create a Pokémon Trainer Club account, you will be able to collect cards, build decks, and compete against other Trainers!
You're playing as a guest. Create an account to access the full game.

versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body1.lab: Each Versus Ladder lasts 3 weeks and provides opportunities to earn cool rewards like Trainer Tokens, booster packs, and Pokémon-EX. Versus Rewards are unlocked with Versus Points, which you earn by winning matches.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body1_b.l: Each Versus Ladder lasts 3 weeks and provides opportunities to earn cool rewards like Trainer Tokens, booster packs, and powerful Pokémon.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body2.lab: Versus Points are awarded each time you win a match in Versus Mode. Each victory is worth 10 points, plus 5 bonus points if your opponent had Advantage. You do not gain or lose Versus Points for losing a match. Versus Points reset to 0 at the start of each new Versus Ladder. The total number of Versus Points you’ve earned and the time remaining in the current Versus Ladder can be found to the right of the Play button.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body2_b.l: Versus Points are awarded each time you win a match in Versus Mode. Each victory is worth 10 points. You can earn 5 bonus points for each consecutive victory, or "Win Streak," which stacks up to 4 times for a total of 20 bonus points for each win. You'll also earn 5 bonus points if your opponent had advantage. If you lose your match, you'll earn 1 Versus Point for each Prize card you took.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body3.lab: The number below each reward indicates the total number of Versus Points needed to unlock it. Versus Rewards are automatically added to your Collection once unlocked. Don’t take too long earning your rewards, though, because Versus Rewards rotate every 3 weeks. Each reward can only be earned once per Versus Ladder. All Versus Rewards items are not tradable.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body3_b.l: Versus Rewards are unlocked and added to your Collection as you earn Versus Points. Don't take too long earning your rewards, though: Versus Ladders start over every 3 weeks with new rewards. All Versus Rewards items are not tradable.
versusscreen.seasonexplanation.body4.lab: If you’re interested in seeing how you stack up against other players from around the world on the Versus Ladder, please visit Pokemon.com/leaderboards. Standings can be viewed for total Versus Points or for each play format.
